special_abilities.name: Edged Scales
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the pangolin or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 4 (1d8) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The pangolin has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claws attacks and one Tail Slap attack.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage and the target must make DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Tuck In
actions.desc: Curls its entire body forming an armored ball. While an armored ball it moves by rolling has resistance to B/P/S damage is immune to the prone condition and it can’t make Claw or Tail Slap attacks or climb. The dire pangolin can uncurl its body as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Bloodthirsty Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the wakwak moves at least 20' straight toward a creature and then hits it with Talon attack on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the wakwak can make one Beak attack vs. it as a bonus action gaining temp hp equal to half the damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Beak attack and one Talon attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Wing Slap (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Slams its sharp-edged wings together in front of itself in a 15 ft. cone. All in area make a DC 13 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 10 (3d6) slashing damage and is pushed up to 10 ft. away from the wakwak and knocked prone. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn’t pushed or knocked prone.

name: Clockwork Armadillo
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Overclocked
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on initiative rolls.

actions.name: Scissor Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d4+4) slashing damage and the target must make DC 11 Con save or drop whatever it is currently holding.

actions.name: Tuck In
actions.desc: Tucks its entire body into its shell forming an armored ball. While an armored ball it moves by rolling has resistance to B/P/S damage is immune to the prone condition and it can’t make Scissor Claws attacks. As part of this action the armadillo can expand its shell outward to contain one object of its size or smaller that isn’t being worn or carried and is within 5 ft. of the armadillo. The armadillo can uncurl its body and release any contained item as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Infernal Runes
special_abilities.desc: Its tattoos give it a +2 bonus to its AC (included above). In addition the ogre has advantage on saves vs. spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Unholy Blade
special_abilities.desc: Infused with unholy power the ogre’s weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon weapon deals an extra 2d6 necrotic (included below).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 19 (4d6+5) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Dark Word
actions.desc: Speaks an infernal word of unmaking at up to two creatures it can see within 120' of it. Each target: DC 16 Con save or take 22 (5d8) necrotic.

reactions.name: Gauntleted Backhand
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 ft. of the ogre misses the ogre with melee attack the attacker must make DC 16 Dex save or be knocked prone

special_abilities.name: Forest of Pikes
special_abilities.desc: If a pike guard is within 5 ft. of at least one pike guard or pike guard captain it has half cover vs. ranged attacks.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Brace Pike
reactions.desc: When a creature enters the pike guard’s reach the pike guard can brace its pike. If it does so it has advantage on its next attack roll vs. that creature.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Choose to succeed failed save.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses its Frightful Presence then one Bite and two Claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 17 (2d10+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: All it picks within 120' and aware of it frightened 1 min (DC 16 Wis negates) Can re-save at end of each of its turns. Save/effect ends: immune 24 hrs.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Uses one of the following:Light Beam. Emits beam of white light in a 90' line that is 5 ft. wide. Each creature in line: 45 (10d8) radiant (DC 19 Dex half).Rainbow Blast. Emits multicolored light in 60' cone. Each creature in area: 36 (8d8) damage (DC 19 Dex half). Dragon splits damage among acid cold fire lightning or poison choosing a number of d8s for each type totaling 8d8. Must choose at least two types.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Int (DC 17) no material components: At will: charm person color spray dancing lights3/day: prismatic spray1/day: prismatic wall

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: Makes a Wis (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (2)
legendary_actions.desc: The prismatic dragon uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Wings (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 20': DC 16 Wis save or take 11 (2d10) radiant and blinded until start of its next turn.

name: Swarm, Biting Gnat
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint by scent the location of warm-blooded creatures within 20' of it.

special_abilities.name: Distracting Buzz
special_abilities.desc: A creature that is not deafened and starts its turn in a space occupied by a swarm of biting gnats must make DC 10 Wis save or become distracted by the droning of the gnats’ wings. A distracted creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks that use Int Wis or Cha for 1 min. A creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If a creature’s save is successful the creature is immune to the swarm’s Distracting Buzz for the next 10 min.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny beast. Can’t regain hp or gain temp hp.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 0' 1 tgt in the swarm’s space. 5 (2d4) piercing damage or 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer. The target must make DC 11 Con save or become blinded for 1 min. The target can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. Alternatively target can use action to clear its eyes of the insects ending effect.

special_abilities.name: Knowledge Charm
special_abilities.desc: Carries a minor magical charm gifted to it by the organization. While wearing or carrying the charm infiltrator has proficiency in any two skills and is fluent in any one language (not included above). This proficiency and fluency last until charm is lost or destroyed or until infiltrator performs a 10-minute ritual to change the proficiency and fluency provided by the charm. If infiltrator dies charm becomes nonmagical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Shortsword attacks and one Dagger attack. It can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 80/320' one target 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Int (DC 13): At will: mage hand message minor illusion3/day ea: charm person sleep1/day: invisibility

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Dash Disengage or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Demise
special_abilities.desc: If the peri dies its body disintegrates into a warm breeze leaving behind only the equipment the peri was wearing or carrying.

actions.name: Wind Slash
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit 5 ft. or range 60' one target 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) lightning or thunder (the peri’s choice).

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: Magically turns invisible until it attacks or uses Storm Wave or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the peri wears or carries is invisible with it.

actions.name: Storm Wave (1/Day)
actions.desc: Throws its arms forward releasing a blast of stormy wind in a 30' line that is 5 ft. wide. All in line make a DC 12 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 7 (2d6) lightning and 7 (2d6) thunder and is pushed up to 10 ft. away from the peri. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn’t pushed.

name: Chemosit
damage_resistances: fire, cold, lightning; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons

special_abilities.name: Inner Light
special_abilities.desc: Its open mouth emits a red light shedding bright light in 10 ft. radius and dim light additional 10 feet. Opening or closing its mouth doesn’t require an action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Beak attack and two Crutch attacks.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) fire.

actions.name: Crutch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage and target: DC 14 Con save or become infected with the cackle fever disease.

actions.name: Inviting Song
actions.desc: Sings an enchanting tune. Each creature with an Int of 5+ within 300' of chemosit that can hear the song: DC 15 Wis save or be charmed until the song ends. Chemosit must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. Song ends if chemosit is incapacitated. If charmed target is more than 5 ft. away from chemosit target must move on its turn toward chemosit by most direct route trying to get within 5 ft.. It won’t move into damaging terrain such as lava or a pit taking whatever route it can to avoid terrain and still reach chemosit. If target can’t find a safe route to chemosit charmed effect ends. Whenever target takes damage or at the end of each of its turns target can re-save. If save succeeds effect ends on it. Target that successfully saves is immune to this chemosit’s Inviting Song for next 24 hrs.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Magically transforms into a Small or Med Humanoid or back into its true Fiendish form. Its stats other than size are the same in each form. No matter the form chemosit always has only one leg. Its crutch adjusts to fit its new form but no other equipment transforms. Reverts on death. Crutch becomes nonmagical.

special_abilities.name: Death’s Accomplice
special_abilities.desc: When it deals radiant can choose to deal necrotic instead.

special_abilities.name: Fiendish Countenance
special_abilities.desc: When traveling planes of existence demons and devils are native to (ex: Hell the Abyss) psychopomp appears to be a Fiend of a type native to that plane. Until it reveals its true nature (no action required) or uses Divine Dictum Spirit Usher or Unmake Contract it is undetectable as a Celestial.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Lantern Flail attacks.

actions.name: Lantern Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d10+3) bludgeoning damage + 4 (1d8) radiant. A fiend or undead hit by this takes extra 10 (3d6) radiant.

actions.name: Divine Dictum (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Unleashes a small portion of its creator’s influence. Each creature of psychopomp’s choice that it can see within 30' of it: 22 (5d8) radiant (DC 14 Wis half). Each charmed frightened or possessed creature of psychopomp’s choice within 60' of it can choose to end the condition.

actions.name: Unmake Contract (1/Day)
actions.desc: Projects power/majesty of its patron deity. Creature it can see or hear within 60': freed of all liens on its soul.

bonus_actions.name: Spirit Usher (3/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: Wards a creature with divine power for 1 hr. While warded Celestials Fiends and Undead have disadvantage on attack rolls vs. the creature and creature can’t be charmed frightened or possessed by them. Warded creature gains 11 temp hp and if slain can’t be raised as an Undead for 1 year.

special_abilities.name: Bladed Shell
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the crab or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the crab moves at least 15 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with Shell Bash attack on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the crab can make one Claw attack vs. it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Claw attack and one Shell Bash attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). The crab has two claws each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Shell Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Sand Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The sand dragon has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Sandy Nature
special_abilities.desc: Is infused with elemental power and it requires only half the air food and drink that a typical dragon if its size needs.

special_abilities.name: Stinging Sand
special_abilities.desc: The first time it hits a target with melee weapon attack target: DC 17 Con save or have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 16 (2d10+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Uses one of the following:Sand Blast. Exhales superheated sand in a 30' cone. Each creature in area: 22 (4d10) piercing damage and 22 (4d10) fire (DC 17 Dex half). If a creature fails its save by 5+ it suffers one level of exhaustion as it dehydrates.Blinding Sand. Breathes fine sand in a 30' cone. Each creature in area: blinded for 1 min (DC 17 Con negates). Blinded creature can take an action to clear its eyes of sand ending effect for it.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Aqueous Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: If it starts its turn in contact with body of water large enough to submerge at least half of its body it regains 10 hp if it has at least 1 hp.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in marshland or swamp terrain.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Stalker
special_abilities.desc: Leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage when it moves through marshland or swamp terrain.

special_abilities.name: Multiattack
special_abilities.desc: Three Slams or two Muck-Coated Slam attacks.

special_abilities.name: Slam
special_abilities.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Muck-Coated Slam (Saturated Only)
special_abilities.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 24 (3d12+5) bludgeoning damage and the target: DC 15 Dex save or its speed is reduced by 10 ft. as mud and muck coat it. A creature including target can take an action to clean off the mud and muck.

special_abilities.name: Water Jet (Saturated Only Recharge 4–6)
special_abilities.desc: Releases all absorbed water as a powerful jet in a 60' line that is 5 ft. wide. Each creature in that line: 40 (9d8) bludgeoning damage and is pushed up to 15 ft. away from it and knocked prone (DC 14 Dex half damage and isn’t pushed or knocked prone). After using Water Jet it is no longer saturated.

bonus_actions.name: Saturated Expansion
bonus_actions.desc: While in contact with body of water it absorbs water that is a cube up to 10 ft. on a side and becomes saturated as water fills its body. While saturated increases in size along with anything it is wearing or carrying becoming Huge and has advantage on Str checks and Str saves. If it lacks room to become Huge it attains max size possible in space available. Ground exposed by the absorbed water becomes difficult terrain.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone with o disturbing material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Persistence of Stone (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: When reduced to below half its hp max Fossil Barrage recharges.

special_abilities.name: Roiling Roots
special_abilities.desc: Its stony roots make the ground within 15 ft. of it difficult terrain for creatures other than the rockwood.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Double damage to objects/structures.

special_abilities.name: Towering Reach
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t have disadvantage on ranged attack rolls from being within 5 ft. of a hostile creature though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Whomping Slam or Rock attacks. If both Slams hit 1 target each creature within 5 ft. of target: 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 15 Dex negates damage and prone).

actions.name: Whomping Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Large or smaller creature it must make DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 60/180' one target 16 (2d10+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fossil Barrage (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Stone shards in 30' cone. Each creature in area: 28 (8d6) piercing damage (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Floral Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide among ample obscuring flowers fruits or vegetables.

special_abilities.name: Messy Digger
special_abilities.desc: Opportunity attacks vs. it have disadvantage when dragonette burrows out of an enemy’s reach.

special_abilities.name: Squat Body
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on ability checks/saves vs. effects to move it vs. its will and if effect moves it vs. its will along the ground can use a reaction to reduce distance moved by up to 10 ft..

actions.name: Head Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage and if target is Small or smaller: DC 12 Str save or be launched up 10 ft. into the air and away from dragonette taking falling damage as normal.

actions.name: Raking Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sticky Tongue
actions.desc: Launches tongue at target up to 15 ft. away. If target is Small or smaller: DC 13 Str save or be pulled up to 15 ft. toward dragonette. If target is Med or larger: DC 13 Dex save or dragonette is pulled up to 15 ft. closer to the target. If target is within 5 ft. of dragonette dragonette can make one Raking Claws attack vs. it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Elusive
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves and ability checks to avoid or escape effect that would reduce its speed. Also nonmagical difficult terrain composed of natural rocks or cavernous terrain doesn’t cost it extra movement.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

actions.name: Thieving Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage can steal one item target is wearing or carrying provided item weighs up to 10 pounds isn’t a weapon and isn’t wrapped around or firmly attached to target. Ex: it could steal a hat or belt pouch but not a creature’s shirt or armor.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit 20/60 ft one target 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Relay
bonus_actions.desc: Teleports one object it is holding that weighs up to 10 pounds into empty hand of one friendly creature it can see within 30' of it. If target isn’t a rochade it must make DC 14 Dex save to catch the object otherwise object falls to the ground in a space within 5 ft. of target.

bonus_actions.name: Short Step
bonus_actions.desc: Teleports to unoccupied space it can see within 15 ft..

reactions.name: Switch
reactions.desc: When a creature rochade can see targets it with attack rochade can switch places with any creature it can see within 15 ft. of it. An unwilling creature must make DC 14 Dex save to avoid the switch. If the switch is successful switched creature becomes attack's target instead.

name: Derro, Hellforged
damage_resistances: cold; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons

special_abilities.name: Insanity
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves vs. being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Hellfire Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 2d6 fire (included below).

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Battleaxe or Hurl Hellfire attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage or 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage if used with two hands + 7 (2d6) fire.

actions.name: Hurl Hellfire
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 12 (3d6+2) fire. If target is a creature or flammable object it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire target takes 5 (1d10) fire at start of each of its turns.

reactions.name: Voice of Authority (Recharge 5–6)
reactions.desc: When a creature hits hellforged with an attack hellforged shrieks a one-word command. Attacker must make DC 15 Wis save or carry out this command on its next turn. This reaction works like the command spell except the attacker doesn’t have to understand the hellforged’s language. Hellforged must see the attacker and be able to speak to use this reaction.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: Can’t use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Double damage to objects/structures.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and one Tail Fin attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 19 (3d8+6) piercing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature: swallowed by the worm (DC 16 Dex negates). A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained it has total cover vs. attacks and other effects outside the worm and it takes 14 (4d6) acid at the start of each of the worm's turns. If the worm takes 25+ damage on a single turn from a creature inside it worm must make DC 18 Con save at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures which fall prone in a space within 10 ft. of the worm. If worm dies a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape the corpse by using 15 ft. of movement exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail Fin
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 16 (3d6+6) slashing damage + 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Red Acid Spume (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales crimson stomach acid in 30' cone if worm is underwater or 50' line × 5 ft. wide if above water. Each creature in area: 31 (9d6) acid (DC 16 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Elemental Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are imbued with its elemental power. When the jinnborn hits with any weapon the weapon deals an extra 1d6 lightning (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Flamboyant Defense
special_abilities.desc: While it is wearing no armor and wielding no shield its AC includes its Cha modifier.

special_abilities.name: Knows the Ropes
special_abilities.desc: Has proficiency with airships sandships or waterborne ships (the jinnborn’s choice). It adds its proficiency bonus to any check it makes to control the chosen type of ship and it adds its proficiency bonus to any saves made while on the chosen type of vehicle.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) lightning.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 80/320' one target 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) lightning.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: + 2 to its AC vs. one melee attack that would hit it if it can see attacker and wielding melee weapon.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight to a creature and then hits it with Gore on same turn target: DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone. If target is prone wildebeest can make one Hooves attack vs. it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Intimidating Glare then 1 Gore and 1 Hooves.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 22 (4d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 18 (4d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Intimidating Glare
actions.desc: Glares at one creature it can see within 30' of it. If target can see wildebeest: DC 15 Wis save or frightened 1 min. Target can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If target’s save is successful/effect ends immune to wildebeest’s Intimidating Glare next 24 hrs.

actions.name: Noxious Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales noxious gas in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in area: 21 (6d6) poison (DC 14 Dex half).

actions.name: Incite Stampede (1/Day)
actions.desc: Moves up to 30' in straight line and can move through space of any up to Med creature. Each friendly creature within 120' of wildebeest can use its reaction to join stampede and move up to 30' in straight line and move through space of any up to Med creature. This move doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks. 1st time stampeding creature enters creature’s space during this move that creature: 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 13 Dex half damage not knocked prone). For each creature in stampede after 1st: save increases by 1 max DC 17 and damage increases by 3 (1d6) max 8d6.

special_abilities.name: Undead Creator
special_abilities.desc: When a creature dies while trapped inside it’s pitcher pitcher regains 11 (2d10) hp and corpse of creature rises as a zombie. This works like the animate dead spell except zombie stays under pitcher’s control for 1d4 days. At end of this duration or when pitcher is destroyed corpse melts into a puddle of necrotic slime.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Five Vine Slams. It can make one Pitcher Swallow in place of two Vine Slams.

actions.name: Vine Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Pitcher Swallow
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) necrotic. If target is a Large or smaller creature scooped up into the pitcher (DC 16 Dex negates). A creature scooped up into a pitcher is blinded and restrained has total cover vs. attacks and other effects outside pitcher and takes 10 (3d6) necrotic at start of each of pitcher’s turns. Pitcher has 4 pitchers each of which can have only one creature at a time. If pitcher takes 30+ damage on a single turn from a creature inside one of its pitchers pitcher must make DC 14 Con save at end of that turn or spill that creature out of the pitcher. Creature falls prone in a space within 5 ft. of pitcher. If pitcher dies a creature in a pitcher is no longer restrained by it and can escape using 15 ft. of movement.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Aura of Mechanical Mishap
special_abilities.desc: The bilge gremlin’s presence interferes with nonmagical objects that have moving parts such as clocks crossbows or hinges within 20' of it. Such objects that aren’t being worn or carried malfunction while within the aura and if in the aura for more than 1 min they cease to function until repaired. If a creature in the aura uses a nonmagical object with moving parts roll a d6. On a 4 5 or 6 weapons such as crossbows or firearms misfire and jam and other objects cease to function. A creature can take its action to restore the malfunctioning object by succeeding on a DC 13 Int check.

special_abilities.name: Filth Dweller
special_abilities.desc: The bilge gremlin is immune to disease.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Makeshift Weapon attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d4+4) piercing damage + 5 (2d4) poison and the target must make DC 13 Con save or contract the sewer plague disease.

actions.name: Makeshift Weapon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage P or S.

special_abilities.name: Dwarven Fleet Foot
special_abilities.desc: When the firecracker takes fire its speed increases by 10 ft. until the end of its next turn. In addition it can immediately reroll its initiative and choose to change its place in the initiative order in subsequent rounds to the result.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Double damage to objects/structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Wrecking Maul or Fire Blast attacks.

actions.name: Wrecking Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) fire. The target must make DC 13 Str save or be pushed up to 15 ft. away from the firecracker and knocked prone.

actions.name: Fire Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 12 (3d6+2) fire.

actions.name: Combustion Wave (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The firecracker slams its massive hammer into the ground battering itself and its foes with fiery shockwave. Each creature within 20' of the firecracker including itself must make a DC 13 Con save taking 10 (3d6) fire and 10 (3d6) thunder on a failed save or half damage if made. Creatures behind cover have advantage on the save.

special_abilities.name: False
special_abilities.desc: [+]Appearance[/+] Motionless: indistinguishable from ordinary tree.

special_abilities.name: Vegetative Clone
special_abilities.desc: A vegetative clone resembles the creature hit by the nariphon’s Thorn attack. Each clone uses stats of an awakened tree except it has the target’s size speed and any special senses such as darkvision. Clones are extensions of the nariphon and it can see and hear what a clone sees and hears as if it was in the clone’s space. The nariphon can switch from using its senses to using a clone’s or back again as a bonus action. Nariphon can have no more than six vegetative clones under its control at one time. Each clone remains until killed or until the nariphon dismisses it (no action required).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Four Roots or Thorns attacks.

actions.name: Roots
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 18 (2d10+7) bludgeoning damage and target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until the grapple ends target is restrained and it takes 3 (1d6) poison at the start of each of its turns. The nariphon has four roots each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Thorns
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit 30/120' one target 17 (3d6+7) piercing damage and target must make DC 18 Wis save or thorn falls to the ground and instantly grows into a vegetative clone (see above) under nariphon’s control.

bonus_actions.name: Bury
bonus_actions.desc: One creature grappled by nariphon is knocked prone dragged into ground and buried just below surface ending grapple. Victim is restrained unable to breathe or stand up. Creature including victim can use action to free buried creature via DC 18 Str.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

special_abilities.name: Web Sense
special_abilities.desc: While in contact with web it knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: Ignores move restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Mirrored Carapace and then one Bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage and target: DC 12 Con save or fall unconscious 1 min. Target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Mirrored Carapace
actions.desc: Projects illusory duplicate of itself that appears in its space. Each time creature targets it if attack result is below 15 targets duplicate instead and destroys duplicate. Duplicate can be destroyed only by attack that hits it. It ignores all other damage/effects. Creature is unaffected by this if it can’t see if it relies on senses other than sight (ex: blindsight) or if it can perceive illusions as false as with truesight. It can’t use this while in darkness.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 13) no material components: At will: minor illusion silent image3/day: major image1/day: hallucinatory terrain

special_abilities.name: Stone Chomper
special_abilities.desc: The rockchewer ogre deals double damage to stone objects and structures with its bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Slams or one Bite and one Slam.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 60/240' one target 21 (3d10+5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it is knocked prone (DC 15 Str negates prone).

actions.name: Chew Rock
actions.desc: Thoroughly crushes a rock in its large maw reducing it to rubble.

actions.name: Gravel Spray
actions.desc: Spits out a 15 ft. cone of crunched up rock. All in area make a DC 15 Dex save taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage or half damage if made. Can use this action only if it has used Chew Rock within the past min.

bonus_actions.name: Quick Chew (Recharge 6)
bonus_actions.desc: Uses Chew Rock.

reactions.name: Rock Catching
reactions.desc: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the rockchewer ogre the ogre can with successful DC 10 Dex save catch the missile and take no bludgeoning from it.

special_abilities.name: Conditional Invisibility
special_abilities.desc: Is invisible in most situations. The following situations reveal its location and enough of its form that attacks vs. it don’t have disadvantage while the situation lasts:In temperatures lower than 50 degrees Fahrenheit or for 1 round after it takes cold: its natural heat outlines it in steam.Darkness: its burning eyes shine visibly marking its location.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Fire Form
special_abilities.desc: Can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide with o squeezing. A creature that touches it or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 4 (1d8) fire.

special_abilities.name: Iron Disruption
special_abilities.desc: Struck by a cold iron weapon becomes visible and can’t use Hurl Flame or Scorching Aura until start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Burning Slams or three Hurl Flames.

actions.name: Burning Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) bludgeoning damage + 11 (2d10) fire. If target is creature/flammable object ignites. Until action used to douse fire target: 5 (1d10) fire at start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 19 (4d6+5) fire.

actions.name: Scorching Aura (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Increases power of its inner fire causing metal weapons and armor to burn red-hot. Each creature within 30' of it in physical contact with manufactured metal object (ex: metal weapon suit of heavy or medium metal armor): 22 (5d8) fire and must make DC 16 Con save or drop object if it can. If it doesn’t drop object (or take off armor) has disadvantage on attacks and ability checks until start of alazai’s next turn.

name: Dawnfly
damage_immunities: cold, fire; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of reach.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Double damage to objects/structures.

special_abilities.name: Unsettling Drone
special_abilities.desc: Creature that starts turn within 10 ft. of dawnfly: DC 19 Con save or incapacitated until start of its next turn. Deafened creatures have advantage. Success: immune to this 24 hrs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and three Tail attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 19 (3d8+6) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 22 (3d10+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wing Slice (Recharge 4–6)
actions.desc: Flies up to 40' in straight line and can move through space of any Huge or smaller creature. First time it enters creature’s space during this move creature: 54 (12d8) slashing damage and stunned until end of its next turn and if dawnfly's wings are ignited from Winged Inferno extra 14 (4d6) fire (DC 19 Dex half isn’t stunned).

bonus_actions.name: Winged Inferno
bonus_actions.desc: Rapidly beats wings igniting them until start of next turn. Shed bright light in 20' radius dim light extra 20'. Creature that touches dawnfly or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it: 7 (2d6) fire. Also when creature starts turn within 5 ft. of dawnfly creature: DC 19 Dex save or 7 (2d6) fire. Effect ends early if dawnfly stops flying.

legendary_actions.name: Dust Burst
legendary_actions.desc: Its wings shed blinding dust within 10 ft. of it. Each creature in the area: DC 19 Con save or be blinded until end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Fiery Downburst (2)
legendary_actions.desc: 15 ft. cone hot air downdraft. All in area: 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6) fire pushed up to 15 ft. from dawnfly in direction following cone and knocked prone (DC 19 Str half damage not pushed/prone).

legendary_actions.name: Snatch and Drop (3)
legendary_actions.desc: Flies up to half its fly speed making one Tail attack at creature within reach on the way. Hits: creature grappled carried and dropped at end of move; normal fall damage.

name: Obeleric
languages: understands Common and Void Speech but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from normal boulder.

special_abilities.name: Ricochet Charge (Defensive Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 15 ft.+ straight to target and then hits target with Boulder Bash attack on same turn target has disadvantage on save vs. being knocked prone. If target is prone obeleric can move up to 15 ft. straight to 2nd target with o provoking opportunity attacks from 1st target and make one Boulder Bash attack vs. 2nd target as a bonus action if 2nd target is within its reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Tentacle Slam or Acid Spit attacks.

actions.name: Boulder Bash (Defensive Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d10+3) bludgeoning damage and target knocked prone (DC 13 Str not prone).

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) acid.

actions.name: Spit Acid
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 20/60' one target 9 (2d6+2) acid. A creature hit by this takes additional 3 (1d6) acid at the start of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Defensive Roll
bonus_actions.desc: Can roll itself into a boulder-like defensive form or back into its tentacled true form. While in defensive form it has resistance to B/P/S damage from nonmagical attacks can’t make Tentacle Slam or Spit Acid attacks and can’t use Reflux.

reactions.name: Reflux
reactions.desc: When the obeleric takes bludgeoning it can vomit acid at one creature within 5 ft. of it. That creature must make DC 13 Dex save or take 3 (1d6) acid.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (2d10+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Beam (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Emits a beam of white light in a 60' line that is 5 ft. wide. Each creature in that line: 36 (8d8) radiant (DC 15 Dex half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Int (DC 14) no material components: At will: dancing lights3/day ea: charm person color spray1/day: prismatic spray

name: Cave Sovereign
damage_resistances: poison, radiant; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/adamantine weapons
languages: understands all but can’t speak, telepathy 120'

special_abilities.name: Deathlights
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that can see sovereigh's glowing antennae starts its turn within 30' of it sovereign can force it to make a DC 18 Wis save if sovereign isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature. If save fails by 5+ creature is stunned until the start of its next turn. Otherwise creature that fails is incapacitated and its speed is reduced to 0 until start of its next turn as it remains transfixed in place by the lights. Unless surprised creature can avert its eyes to avoid the save at start of its turn. If creature does so it can’t see sovereign until start of its next turn when it can avert again. If creature looks at sovereign in the meantime it must immediately save.

special_abilities.name: Illumination
special_abilities.desc: Its antennae shed dim light in a 5 ft. radius. Radius increases to 20' while at least one creature is incapacitated or stunned by Deathlights. At start of its turn if no creatures are incapacitated or stunned by Deathlights sovereign can suppress this light until start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Inscrutable
special_abilities.desc: Immune to any effect to sense its emotions or read its thoughts as well as any divination spell it refuses. Wis (Insight) checks made to ascertain sovereign's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Choose to succeed failed save.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

special_abilities.name: Sinuous Form
special_abilities.desc: Provided there is suitable room to accommodate its bulk can squeeze through any opening large enough for a Small creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Slams. It can make one Tail in place of its Bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 25 (4d8+7) piercing damage + 11 (2d10) poison.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 23 (3d10+7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 26 (3d12+7) slashing damage. If target is a Large or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 18). Until the grapple ends the target is restrained and sovereign can’t use its tail on another target.

actions.name: Consume Soul (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60' of it that are incapacitated or stunned by Deathlights. Each target: 55 (10d10) psychic (DC 18 Wis half). Creature stunned by Deathlights has disadvantage on this save. Sovereign then regains hp equal to half total psychic dealt. A Humanoid slain by this rises 1d4 rounds later as a zombie under sovereign’s control unless Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. Sovereign can have no more than thirty zombies under its control at one time.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
actions.desc: Cha (DC 18) no spell components: At will: detect thoughts mage hand (the hand is invisible)3/day ea: dimension door telekinesis1/day: hallucinatory terrain (as an action)

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The cave sovereign moves up to its speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Telekinetic Reel
legendary_actions.desc: Magically pulls incapacitated or stunned creature by its Deathlights it can see up to 20' straight toward it.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Makes one Tail attack.

special_abilities.name: Divine Weapons
special_abilities.desc: When it hits with any weapon deals extra 2d8 necrotic or radiant (included below) apostle’s choice.

special_abilities.name: Faith’s Reward
special_abilities.desc: When it casts the bless spell it gains the benefit of the spell even if it doesn’t include itself as a target. In addition when apostle restores hp to another creature it regains hp equal to half that amount.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Mace or Divine Bolt attacks. It can replace one attack with use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage + 9 (2d8) necrotic or radiant (the apostle’s choice).

actions.name: Divine Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) necrotic or radiant (apostle’s choice).

actions.name: Destroy Undead (2/Day)
actions.desc: Presents its holy symbol and intones a prayer. Each undead within 30' of apostle that can see or hear it: 28 (8d6) radiant (DC 15 Wis half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 15): At will: guidance spare the dying thaumaturgy3/day ea: bless cure wounds (3rd-level) hold person lesser restoration1/day ea: bestow curse daylight freedom of movement mass cure wounds revivify

special_abilities.name: Forest of Pikes
special_abilities.desc: If within 5 ft. of at least one pike guard or pike guard captain it has half cover vs. ranged attacks.

special_abilities.name: Pike Mastery
special_abilities.desc: As the pike guard.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Not One Step Back if it can; then two Pikes.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 14 (2d10+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Not One Step Back! (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Bellows an order inspiring its subordinates to glory. Each creature of captain’s choice within 10 ft. of it becomes immune to charmed and frightened conditions for 1 min. In addition grants one such creature the Bring It Down reaction for 1 min allowing target to make opportunity attack if a pike guard or captain deals damage to a creature in target’s reach. Captain can share Bring It Down with only one creature at a time. If captain shares Bring It Down with another effect on previous target ends. These effects end early if the captain is incapacitated.

reactions.name: Brace Pike
reactions.desc: When a creature enters the captain’s reach the captain can brace its pike. If it does so it has advantage on its next attack roll vs. that creature.

reactions.name: Bring It Down
reactions.desc: When a creature within captain’s reach takes damage from a pike guard or pike guard captain captain can make one opportunity attack vs. that creature.

name: Devil, Devilflame Juggler
damage_resistances: cold; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons

special_abilities.name: Devil’s Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede its darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Dizzying Movement
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 15 ft.+ on a turn each creature that can see the move: poisoned until end of its next turn (DC 18 Con).

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 30' and its high jump is up to 15 ft. with or with o a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Deft Touch or Devilflame Sphere attacks. If it hits 1 creature with 2 Deft Touches or 2 Devilflame Spheres target: DC 18 Wis save or frightened until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Deft Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) slashing damage + 9 (2d8) fire. Instead of dealing damage juggler can steal one item target is wearing or carrying provided item weighs no more than 15 pounds and isn’t wrapped around or firmly attached to target such as a shirt or belt.

actions.name: Devilflame Sphere
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 22 (4d8+4) fire.

actions.name: Fiery Flourish (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Tosses hellfire ball at creature it can see within 90' of it. Target: 45 (10d8) fire (DC 18 Dex half). Ball then splits and bounces to up to 4 creatures within 30' of target. Each of these: 22 (5d8) fire (DC 18 Dex half). This fire ignites flammable objects that aren’t being worn or carried and are between each of the targets.

bonus_actions.name: Nimble Leap
bonus_actions.desc: The juggler takes the Dash or Disengage action.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: When an attacker it can see hits it with an attack can choose to take half dmg instead.

name: Demon, Balbazu
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; nonmagic B/P/S attacks

special_abilities.name: Aquatic Invisibility
special_abilities.desc: Invisible while fully immersed in water.

special_abilities.name: Blood Reservoir
special_abilities.desc: Stores drained blood within itself. Each time it causes blood loss to a creature its Blood Reservoir increases by amount equal to hp of blood it drained from the creature.

special_abilities.name: Demon Food
special_abilities.desc: A demon within 5 ft. of it and that isn’t another balbazu can use a bonus action to reduce the Blood Reservoir by up to 10 regaining hp equal to that amount as it drinks blood from the reservoir.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage and it attaches to target. While attached balbazu doesn’t attack. Instead at start of each of balbazu’s turns target loses 10 (2d6+3) hp from blood loss. When balbazu first attaches to the target and each time target loses hp from blood loss target unaware of the attack (and balbazu if it is invisible). Target is still aware of the hp loss but it feels no pain from the attack. (DC 11 Con target is aware of the attack and balbazu and doesn’t need to continue making this save while it remains attached to it.) Regains hp equal to half hp of blood it drains. Balbazu can detach itself by spending 5 ft. of its move. A creature that is aware of the balbazu including the target can use its action to detach the balbazu.

name: Rakshasa, Servitor
damage_vulnerabilities: piercing from magic weapons wielded by good creatures

special_abilities.name: Limited Magic Immunity
special_abilities.desc: Can’t be affected or detected by cantrips unless it wishes to be. Has advantage on saves vs. all other spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) poison.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 30/120' one target 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) poison.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 11) no material components: At will: detect thoughts disguise self1/day: cause fear

reactions.name: Protecting Pounce
reactions.desc: When a rakshasa the servitor can see within 15 ft. of it is the target of an attack the servitor can move up to half its speed toward that rakshasa with o provoking opportunity attacks. If it ends this movement within 5 ft. of the rakshasa the servitor becomes the target of the attack instead.

name: Swarm, Ice Borers
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from cluster of icicles. This trait doesn’t function if swarm has damaged a creature with blood within the past 2 hrs.

special_abilities.name: Frigid Mass
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn in the swarm’s space takes 4 (1d8) cold.

special_abilities.name: Heatsense
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can pinpoint the location of creatures emitting heat such as warm-blooded Beasts and Humanoids within 30' of it.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny elemental. Can’t regain hp or gain temp hp.

actions.name: Impale
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm’s space. 7 (2d6) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) cold or 3 (1d6) piercing damage + 4 (1d8) cold if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Insanity
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves vs. being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Poisonous Vapors
special_abilities.desc: When a creature enters a space within 5 ft. of abysswalker or starts its turn there that creature: 13 (2d12) poison and is poisoned until the start of its next turn (DC 15 Con half damage and isn’t poisoned.)

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite one Claw and one Scimitar or it makes one Bite and two Scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d4+4) piercing damage and 5 (2d4) poison.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage and target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Med or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends target is restrained and abysswalker can’t make Claw attacks vs. other targets.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Glowing Organs
special_abilities.desc: While underwater its internal organs glow an eerie pale blue shedding dim light in a 10 ft. radius.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: While out of water can hold its breath for 30 min.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe only underwater.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 14 (3d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Stinging Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) poison. Target must make DC 16 Con save or be paralyzed for 1 min. A frightened creature has disadvantage on this save. Paralyzed target can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Frightening Visage (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: If underwater it flares the light from its organs making skull-like structure within more apparent. If above water the coastline reaper tightly pulls in its outer flesh causing its body to take on a fleshy skull-like appearance. Each Humanoid within 30' of it that can see it: 21 (6d6) psychic and frightened 1 min (DC 16 Wis half not frightened). Frightened creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

name: Wandering Haze
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

special_abilities.name: Acidic Fog
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn in the wandering haze’s space takes 7 (2d6) acid.

special_abilities.name: Cloud Form
special_abilities.desc: Can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide with o squeezing and can enter a hostile creature’s space and vice versa. The haze’s space is heavily obscured.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from ordinary cloud or fog bank.

special_abilities.name: Ooze Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 11 (2d4+6) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) acid.

actions.name: Sheath of Chaos
actions.desc: Wraps its cloudy form tighter around those within it. Each creature in the wandering haze’s space: 27 (6d8) psychic and is disoriented until end of its next turn as its mind fills with gibbering terrors of chaos that created haze’s form (DC 17 Wis half damage and not disoriented). When a disoriented creature moves it moves in a random direction.

actions.name: Acidic Cloudburst (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Releases a deluge of acid. Each creature within 10 ft. of it: 35 (10d6) acid and speed halved 1 min (DC 17 Dex half damage and speed not reduced). A creature with halved speed can make a DC 17 Con save at the end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Choose to succeed failed save.

special_abilities.name: Regal Bearing
special_abilities.desc: The chimera’s AC includes its Cha modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite one Claws and one Eldritch Horns or it makes two Arcane Blasts.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 18 (2d12+5) force.

actions.name: Serpent Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 21 (3d10+5) force.

actions.name: Searing Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dragon head exhales 30' cone of fire that burns and blinds. Each creature in area: 45 (10d8) fire and is blinded until the end of its next turn (DC 17 Dex half damage not blinded).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Goat head casts one of the following spells. Cha (DC 18) only verbal components: At will: charm person dispel magic mage hand3/day ea: bestow curse enthrall haste1/day: dominate person

legendary_actions.name: Prideful Prowl
legendary_actions.desc: Moves up to its walking speed or flies up to half its flying speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Serpent Strike
legendary_actions.desc: Makes one Serpent Strike attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Roar of the King (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Lion head's bellow spurs allies. Each friendly creature including chimera within 30' of it that can hear roar gains 11 (2d10) temp hp and can’t be frightened for 1 min.

name: Chaos Raptor
languages: understands Common and Terran, but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Aura of Chaos
special_abilities.desc: When a creature with Int of 4 or higher starts its turn within 30' of raptor creature must make a DC 18 Cha save. Fail: creature can’t take reactions until start of its next turn and must roll a d8 to determine what it does during that turn. On 1-4 creature does nothing. On 5-6 creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On 7-8 creature makes one melee attack vs. randomly determined creature within its reach or it does nothing if no creature is within its reach. At start of raptor’s turn it chooses whether this aura is active.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone with o disturbing material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: sight Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Raptor regains 20 hp at start of its turn if at least half of its body is submerged in earth or stone. If raptor takes thunder this trait doesn’t function at start of raptor’s next turn. Raptor dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Beak attack and one Talons attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 27 (4d8+9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 23 (4d6+9) slashing damage and target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends target is restrained and raptor can’t use its talons on another target.

special_abilities.name: Air Senses
special_abilities.desc: Can’t use blindsight underwater or in an area with o air.

special_abilities.name: Air Weapons
special_abilities.desc: When it attacks it conjures a weapon out of the air itself weapon appearing and disappearing in the blink of an eye. Air weapon is a swirl of wind in the shape of a simple or martial weapon but always deals 2d6 damage of the same type as that weapon. Air weapon shaped like a ranged weapon uses the range of that weapon except acolyte doesn’t have disadvantage on ranged attack rolls when attacking a target beyond weapon’s normal range. Air weapons don’t use any other weapon properties of weapons they mimic. Air weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Air Weapon attacks. If acolyte hits one creature with two Air Weapon attacks target: DC 15 Str save or be pushed up to 15 ft. away from acolyte.

actions.name: Air Weapon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 10 ft. or range defined by chosen weapon one target 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage slashing or piercing as defined by chosen weapon.

actions.name: Wind’s Rebuke (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Draws breath out of one creature it can see within 60' of it. Target: DC 15 Con save. Fail: all of the breath is drawn from target’s lungs and it immediately begins suffocating for 1 min or until it falls unconscious. It can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

reactions.name: Buoying Wind
reactions.desc: Summons winds to break the fall of up to 5 falling creatures it can see within 60' of it. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60' per round for 1 min. If a falling creature lands before effect ends it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet.

reactions.name: Drift
reactions.desc: When a creature moves to within 15 ft. of the wind acolyte the acolyte can fly up to half its flying speed.

name: Lycanthrope, Wereotter
damage_immunities: nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with silvered weapons
senses: darkvision 60' (otter & hybrid forms only), passive Perception 14

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 10 min.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid is cursed with wereotter lycanthropy (DC 11 Con negates curse).

actions.name: Javelin (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/120' one target 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Net (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit 5/15 ft. one target Large or smaller creature hit by net is restrained until freed. Net has no effect on creatures that are formless or Huge or larger. Creature including target can use action to free restrained target via DC 11 Str check. Dealing 5 slashing to net (AC 10) frees target with o harming it ending effect and destroying net.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Transforms into a Med otter-humanoid hybrid or into Large otter or back into true form: Humanoid. Stats other than size are same in each form. Items worn/ carried not transformed. Reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20+' straight toward a target and then hits it with Horn attack on same turn karkadann impales target on its horn grappling the target if it is a Large or smaller creature (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends the target is restrained takes 18 (4d8) piercing damage at start of each of its turns and karkadann can’t make horn attacks vs. other targets.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 24 (4d8+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Toss
actions.desc: One Large or smaller creature impaled by karkadann is thrown up to 30' in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 ft. it was thrown. If target is thrown at another creature that creature must make DC 15 Dex save or take same damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: Touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 22 (4d8+2) hp and is cured of all diseases and poisons afflicting it.

special_abilities.name: Painted for War
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Cha (Intimidation) checks and advantage on savings throws vs. being frightened. In addition each friendly creature within 10 ft. of warrior and that can see it has advantage on saves vs. being frightened.

special_abilities.name: Woodfriend
special_abilities.desc: When in a forest alseid leave no tracks and automatically discern true north.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d6+2) slashing damage.

Each creature within a 10 ft. radius of where sphere landed: DC 13 Dex save or be brightly painted for 8 hrs. Any attack roll vs. creature has advantage if attacker can see it and other creatures have advantage on any Wis (Perception) or Wis (Survival) check made to find the marked creature. To remove the effect a creature must spend 1 min bathing. Alternatively spells that create water or clean objects such as prestidigitation also remove the effect.

special_abilities.desc: Is infused with elemental power and it requires only half the amount of air food and drink that a typical Monstrosity of its size needs.

special_abilities.name: Glide
special_abilities.desc: Has membranes between its fore and hind limbs that expand while falling to slow its rate of descent to 60' per round landing on its feet and taking no falling damage. It can move up to 5 ft. horizontally for every 1' it falls. Can’t gain height with its gliding membranes alone. If subject to a strong wind or lift of any kind can use updraft to glide farther.

special_abilities.name: Glow
special_abilities.desc: Sheds dim light in a 10 ft. radius.

special_abilities.name: Heated Body
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the ember glider or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 4 (1d8) fire.

special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Blazing Tail (Recharge 5–6)

condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from ordinary pile of leaves.

special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require sleep.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 13 (3d8) acid and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends target is restrained ooze can automatically hit target with its Pseudopod and ooze can’t make Pseudopod attacks vs. others.

actions.desc: Releases spores from the mold coating its leaves. Each creature within 20' of ooze: 14 (4d6) poison and is choking (DC 13 Con half damage and isn’t choking). A choking creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.desc: The erina can grapple creatures two sizes larger than itself and can move at its full speed when dragging a creature it has grappled. If it grapples a Small or smaller creature target has disadvantage on its escape attempts. Erina has advantage on ability checks and saves made to escape a grapple or end restrained condition.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: The erina has advantage on saves vs. poison.

special_abilities.name: Spines
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches erina or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage. A creature grappled by or grappling erina takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage at start of the erina’s turn.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Throw Spine
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 20/60' one target 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage and spine sticks in target until a creature uses an action to remove it. While spine is stuck target has disadvantage on weapon attacks that use Str.

special_abilities.name: Firesight
special_abilities.desc: Can see through areas obscured by fire smoke and fog with o penalty.

special_abilities.name: Smoldering Death
special_abilities.desc: When it dies its body crumbles into smoldering coals releasing a great plume of smoke that fills 15 ft. radius sphere centered on zombie’s corpse and spreads around corners. Area is heavily obscured and difficult terrain. When creature enters area for first time on a turn or starts its turn there: 7 (2d6) poison (DC 14 Con half). Smoke lasts for 1 min or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hr) disperses it.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hp it must make a Con save with DC of 5+the damage taken unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success the zombie drops to 1 hp instead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage + 9 (2d8) fire.

actions.desc: The zombie breathes a cloud of smoke in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area: 9 (2d8) fire and 7 (2d6) poison (DC 15 Con half). Smoke remains until the start of the zombie’s next turn and its area is heavily obscured.

special_abilities.name: Apposable Thumbs
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on climb-related Str (Athletics).

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: [+]and Smell[/+] Advantage: hearing/smell Wis (Perception).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claws attacks and uses Astral Pouch.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Astral Pouch
actions.desc: Reaches into its extradimensional pouch and chooses a point it can see within 30' of it. Each creature within 10 ft. of that point suffers effect delow determined by d6 roll if creature fails DC 13 Dex save. It is immune to its own Astral Pouch effects.1 Ball Bearings Roll out of the pouch scattering at end of astralsupial’s next turn. Creature knocked prone).2 Cooking Utensils Cast-iron cook pans fly out. Creature: 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage.3 Tangled Threads Mass of Threads bursts out of pouch. Creature restrained until a creature uses action to break thread (DC 10 Str).4 Astral Mirror Imbued with trace of Astral Plane’s power flashes brilliantly. Creature: 1d4 psychic and blinded until end of its next turn.5 Smelly Trash Handfuls of putrid trash spill from the pouch. Creature is poisoned for 1 min. Creature can make a DC 13 Con save at the end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.6 Magic Beans Magical beans bounce out of the pouch. A creature takes 10 (4d4) fire on a failed save or half as much if made.

bonus_actions.name: Astral Traveler (2/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: Briefly surrounds itself in a shower of glittering dust and teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

reactions.name: Playing Dead
reactions.desc: When reduced to 10 hp or less it feigns death in hopes of deceiving its attackers. A creature that sees it in this state can determine it is a ruse via DC 15 Wis (Medicine) check. Ruse lasts until astralsupial ends it (no action required) up to 8 hrs. 1st attack it makes within 1 round of ending ruse has advantage.

special_abilities.name: Consumed by Rage (Anger Only)
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Str (Athletics).

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Ruled by Sorrow (Despair Only)
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves vs. being charmed and frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 3 Blazing Fist or Shadow Tendrils or 3 Divine Bolts.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) fire and 7 (2d6) radiant.

actions.name: Shadow Tendril (Despair Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) necrotic and target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends target is restrained. Despair and anger has three shadow tendrils each of which can grapple only one target. At start of each of despair and anger’s turns each creature grappled by it takes 7 (2d6) necrotic and despair and anger regains hp equal to half the total necrotic dealt.

actions.name: Divine Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 22 (4d8+4) necrotic (if despair is active) or radiant (if anger is active).

actions.name: Burning Rage (Anger Only Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Each creature within 30': 21 (6d6) fire and 21 (6d6) radiant (DC 16 Dex half).

actions.name: Despairing Rejection (Despair Only Recharge 4–6)
actions.desc: Assaults minds of up to 3 creatures it can see within 30' of it with despair. Each target: 17 (5d6) cold and 17 (5d6) psychic and must use its reaction to move its full speed away from despair and anger by safest available route unless there is nowhere to move this move doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks (DC 16 Wis half damage and doesn’t move away).

bonus_actions.name: Change Aspect
bonus_actions.desc: Changes aspect in control. Only one active at a time. Creature grappled by despair no longer grappled by anger.

name: Lycanthrope, Werecrocodile
damage_immunities: nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with silvered weapons

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath (Crocodile or Hybrid Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 15 min.

actions.name: Bite (Crocodile or Hybrid Form Only)
