Until the grapple ends the target is restrained and werecrocodile can’t bite another. If target is a Humanoid it must make DC 12 Con save or be cursed with werecrocodile lycanthropy.

actions.name: Tail Swipe (Crocodile or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 5 ft. 1 tgt not grappled by werecrocodile. 7 (2d4+2) bludgeoning damage and target knocked prone (DC 12 Str negates prone).

actions.name: Khopesh (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage or 7 (1d10+2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

special_abilities.name: Corpse Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once on its turn use 10 ft. of move to step magically into one corpse/Undead within reach and emerge from 2nd within 60' of 1st appearing in unoccupied space within 5 ft. of 2nd.

special_abilities.name: Graveyard Walker
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of tombstones grave dirt corpses or other objects or features common to graveyards and necropolises doesn’t cost it extra move and it can move through graveyard objects and structures (ex: sarcophagus mausoleum) as if difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force if it ends turn inside object.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Master of Undeath
special_abilities.desc: Humanoid it kills or Undead it controls rises in 1 min as skeleton/zombie (vetala’s choice) unless Humanoid restored to life or body destroyed. Max 20 total under its control at a time.

special_abilities.name: Shepherd of Death
special_abilities.desc: When an Undead under the vetala’s control hits with any weapon the weapon deals an extra 4 (1d8) necrotic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage + 9 (2d8) necrotic.

actions.desc: One Humanoid corpse it can see within 30' of it rises as a skeleton or zombie (vetala’s choice) under vetala’s control.

bonus_actions.name: Command Corpse
bonus_actions.desc: Commands one Undead under its control that it can see to make a weapon attack as reaction. If so has advantage.

reactions.name: Corpse Detonation
reactions.desc: When Undead under its control is reduced to 0 hp vetala can force it to explode. Each creature that isn’t Undead or vetala within 5 ft. of exploding Undead: 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage (if zombie) or slashing (if skeleton) damage and 5 (2d4) poison (DC 15 Dex half).

name: Golem, Origami
damage_immunities: poison, psychic; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Unfolded Form)
special_abilities.desc: Motionless indistinguishable from ordinary paper screen tapestry or similar flat paper/fabric art.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap (Frog Form)
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 30' and its high jump is up to 15 ft. with or with o a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Lacerating Strike or Wing Buffet attacks.

actions.name: Lacerating Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 16 (3d8+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Wing Buffet (Dragon or Swan Form)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (3d6+3) bludgeoning damage and target must make DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Hazardous Hop (Frog Form)
actions.desc: If it jumps 15 ft.+ as part of its move it can then use this to land on its feet in unoccupied space it can see. Each creature within 10 of golem when it lands: 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 15 Dex half not prone).

actions.name: Shredded Breath (Dragon Form Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales a spray of paper fragments in a 30' cone. Each creature in area: 31 (9d6) slashing damage and blinded until end of its next turn (DC 15 Dex half not blinded).

actions.name: Trumpeting Blast (Swan Form Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Emits a trumpeting blast in 30' cone. Each creature in area: 31 (7d8) thunder and deafened until end of its next turn (DC 15 Con half not deafened).

bonus_actions.name: Fold
bonus_actions.desc: Reshape papery body to resemble Large dragon Large swan or Med frog. Use again to unfold into Large flat piece of fabric/paper. Stats except size same in each form. Unfolded if it dies.

name: Starving Specter
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Aura of the Forgotten
special_abilities.desc: Beasts and Humanoids within 10 ft. of the starving specter have disadvantage on saves.

special_abilities.name: Ethereal Sight
special_abilities.desc: Can see 60' into the Ethereal Plane.

special_abilities.name: Life Hunger
special_abilities.desc: When a creature specter can see regains hp specter's next Bite deals extra 7 (2d6) necrotic on a hit.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: Move through others/objects as difficult terrain. Takes 5 (1d10) force if it ends turn in object.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Unnerving Visage
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that can see specter’s faces starts its turn within 30' of it at least one of specter’s faces shifts to look like one of the creature’s departed loved ones or bitter enemies if specter isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature. Creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic and is frightened of specter until start of its next turn (DC 14 Wis negates both). Unless surprised a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the save at start of its turn. If creature does so it can’t see the specter until the start of its next turn when it can avert again. If creature looks at specter in the meantime it must immediately save.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and one Bladed Arm attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Bladed Arm
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage. This attack can target a creature on the Ethereal or Material Plane.

name: Blaspheming Hand
damage_resistances: cold, fire, psychic; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons
languages: understands Abyssal and Infernal but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Steadfast
special_abilities.desc: Can’t be charmed or frightened while at least one of its allies is within 30' of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Claw attack and uses Evil Fingers.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage and target is grappled (escape DC 14) if it is a Med or smaller creature and hand isn’t being used as a mount. Until the grapple ends the target is restrained hand can’t use its Claw on another and hand’s walking speed is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Evil Fingers
actions.desc: Gestures at one creature it can see within 60' causing one of the following effects:Beckoning Finger Target: DC 14 Str save or be magically pulled up to 30' in a straight line toward hand. If creature is pulled to within 5 ft. of the hand hand can make one Claw attack vs. it as a bonus action.Punishing Finger Target: DC 14 Cha save or take 10 (3d6) fire and be marked for punishment. Until start of hand’s next turn each time punished target makes an attack vs. the hand or its rider target takes 7 (2d6) fire.Repelling Finger Target: DC 14 Str save or take 11 (2d10) force and be pushed up to 10 ft. away from the hand and knocked prone.Unravelling Finger Target: DC 14 Wis save or bear a magical mark. When hand deals damage to marked creature regains hp equal to half damage dealt. Mark lasts until hand dismisses it as a bonus action or it uses Unravelling Finger again.

special_abilities.name: Cheek Worm Regrowth
special_abilities.desc: Has twenty worms stored in its cheeks. Used worms regrow when the grivid finishes a long rest.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: sight Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Parasitic Cheek Worm
special_abilities.desc: Produces parasitic worms in its cheeks and it expels these worms into other creatures when it attacks. Worm burrows into target's flesh and that creature is poisoned while infested with at least one worm. At start of each of infested creature’s turns it takes 5 (2d4) poison. Any creature can take an action to remove one worm with successful DC 12 Wis (Medicine) check. An effect that cures disease removes and kills one worm infesting the creature. When grivid dies all worms currently infesting creatures die ending infestation in all infested creatures.

special_abilities.name: Worm Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: If it has at least 1 hp grivid regains 5 hp for each worm infesting another creature at start of its turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Kicks or three Spit Worms.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one creature,. 18 (3d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison and target must make DC 16 Con save or be infested with parasitic cheek worm (see above) if grivid has at least 1 cheek worm.

actions.name: Kick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 18 (3d8+5) bludgeoning damage and target must make DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Spit Worm
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit 20/60' one creature. 13 (3d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) poison and target: DC 16 Con save or be infested with parasitic cheek worm (see above) if grivid has at least 1 cheek worm.

bonus_actions.name: Consume Worms
bonus_actions.desc: Consumes up to 3 cheek worms regaining 5 (2d4) hp for each worm consumed.

special_abilities.name: Forged Forgery
special_abilities.desc: Thursir armorers wear armor forged from dwarven armor and shaped to resemble dwarven armor. Skilled blacksmiths can recognize and exploit this design quirk. When a creature proficient with smith’s tools scores a critical hit vs. thursir armorer armorer’s armor breaks reducing armorer’s AC by 5 until armorer repairs armor. If armorer is critically hit by any creature while its armor is broken armor shatters and is destroyed reducing armorer’s AC to 12.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Flinging Smash if available. Then two Battleaxe attacks or one Battleaxe and one Shield Bash.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) slashing damage or 16 (2d10+5) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage and the target must make DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Flinging Smash (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Makes sweeping strike with shield. Each creature within 10 ft. of armorer: pushed up to 15 ft. away from it and knocked prone (DC 16 Str negates push and prone).

actions.name: Runic Armor (3/Day)
actions.desc: Can inscribe the thurs rune on its armor. When a creature hits armorer with melee weapon attack while rune is active creature takes 4 (1d8) lightning and can’t take reactions until start of its next turn. Rune lasts for 1 min.

bonus_actions.name: Harness Dwarven Soul
bonus_actions.desc: Draws on the soul fragment trapped in one of the dwarven skulls on its belt. Armorer has advantage on ability checks when using smith’s tools and on attack rolls using a battleaxe handaxe light hammer or warhammer until start of its next turn. It carries six skulls on its belt.

special_abilities.name: Rubbery Flesh
special_abilities.desc: Immune to any form-altering spell/effect and has advantage on ability checks and saves to escape grapple. Can move through a space as narrow as 1ft. wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap (Ball Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 60' and its high jump is up to 30 feet with or with o a running start.

actions.name: Slam (Extended or True Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Snap Back (Extended Form Only)
actions.desc: Violently returns to its true form. Each creature within 5 ft. of it: 4 (1d8) thunder or 9 (2d8) if catterball has extended its reach to 15 feet and is deafened for 1 min (DC 12 Dex half damage not deafened). A deafened creature can make a DC 12 Con save at the end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

bonus_actions.name: Change Form
bonus_actions.desc: Can extend its body roll up into a ball or return to true form. Each time it extends its body its reach with slam increases by 5 feet max 15 feet and Armor Class decreases by 1.

name: Rafflesian
languages: understands the languages of its host companion but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Symbiote
special_abilities.desc: Can bond with willing Humanoid creature that remains in physical contact with it for 10 min. While bonded this way host gains +2 bonus to AC and saves and resistance to all damage and rafflesian’s speed is 0 moving with host when it moves. Each time host takes damage rafflesian takes same amount. If host is subjected to effect that would force it to save host can use its save bonuses or rafflesian’s. If both are subjected to same effect only one is affected rafflesian’s choice. Rafflesian and host otherwise retain their own stats and take separate turns. Rafflesian and host can’t be separated unless rafflesian chooses to terminate connection. Rafflesian can detach itself safely from host over course of 1 hr or can detach itself from creature as an action which immediately kills host.

special_abilities.name: Symbiotic Thought
special_abilities.desc: Bonded it and host communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 3 Vine Whips. Can replace 1 attack with Blood Root use.

actions.name: Vine Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 17 (3d8+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Blood Root
actions.desc: Launches a root toward one creature it can see within 30' of it. The creature must make DC 15 Dex save or take 14 (4d6) necrotic as the rafflesian drains blood from it. The rafflesian or the host (the rafflesian’s choice) then regains hp equal to damage taken.

reactions.name: Last Resort
reactions.desc: When host dies rafflesian can reanimate it up to 10 days if body is still intact. During this time host protected from decay and can’t become undead. Rafflesian can use bonus action to cause host to move as in life but host can’t take other actions. If host could speak in life rafflesian can speak with host’s voice. Host reanimated this way can be restored to life by any spell capable of that.

special_abilities.name: Armored Berserker
special_abilities.desc: The pain caused by the iron plates bolted to its body keep it on the edge of madness. Whenever it starts its turn with 60 hp or fewer roll a d6. On a 6 it goes berserk. While berserk has resistance to B/P/S damage. On each of its turns while berserk it attacks nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack attacks an object with preference for object smaller than itself. Once it goes berserk continues to do so until destroyed or regains all its hp.

special_abilities.name: Dual Shields
special_abilities.desc: Carries two shields which together give it a +3 bonus to its AC (included in its AC).

special_abilities.name: Poor Depth Perception
special_abilities.desc: Has disadvantage on attack rolls vs. a target more than 30' away from it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three melee attacks only one of which can be a Shield Shove. If it uses two hands to make a Spear attack it can’t make an Iron Axe attack that turn.

actions.name: Iron Axe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shield Shove
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (4d4+5) bludgeoning damage and target: DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone or pushed up to 15 ft. away from abaasy (abaasy’s choice).

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 15 ft. or range 20/60' one target 15 (3d6+5) piercing damage or 18 (3d8+5) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Eyebeam (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Fires a beam of oscillating energy from its eye in a 90' line that is 5 ft. wide. Each creature in the line: 27 (5d10) radiant (DC 16 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The porcillina has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Poisonous Flesh
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the porcellina or consumes the meat of the porcellina must make DC 11 Con save or become poisoned for 1 hr.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage and the target must make DC 11 Dex save or be knocked prone. The DC increases by 1 for each other porcellina that hit the target since the end of this porcellina’s previous turn to a max of DC 15.

reactions.name: Squeal
reactions.desc: When a porcellina is hit with an attack it can let out a blood-curdling scream. Each creature within 10 ft. of the porcellina must make DC 11 Wis save or become frightened until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Discordant Drone
special_abilities.desc: Creatures within 15 ft. of it can’t hear each other’s spoken words and can’t cast spells with verbal components.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Double damage to objects/structures.

special_abilities.name: Unstoppable
special_abilities.desc: Moving through difficult terrain doesn’t cost it extra movement and its speed can’t be reduced.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison and target is poisoned until end of its next turn (DC 16 Con negates poison).

actions.name: Burrowing Burst
actions.desc: If it burrows 20'+ as part of its movement it can use this action to emerge in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures and each creature within 10 ft. of the scarab’s space takes 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone (DC 16 Dex half damage and is pushed up to 10 ft. out of the scarab’s space into an unoccupied space of the creature’s choice; If no unoccupied space is within range creature instead falls prone in scarab’s space). Area within 10 ft. of the scarab’s space then becomes difficult terrain.

actions.name: Wing Beat (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The suncatcher scarab rapidly beats its wings releasing sound or light in a 60' cone.Effect depends on if the elytra is closed or open:Closed Elytra: Creature takes 35 (10d6) thunder is pushed up to 15 ft. away from the scarab and is knocked prone (DC 16 Con half and isn’t pushed or knocked prone).Open Elytra: Creature takes 35 (10d6) radiant and blinded until end of its next turn (DC 16 Con half and isn’t blinded).

special_abilities.name: Final Fury
special_abilities.desc: When reduced to 0 hp its head and neck separate from body. Snake-like remnant immediately attacks nearest creature moving up to its speed if necessary even if it has already taken its turn this round. This remnant has same stats as original tigebra except it is Medium has 30 hp and can make only one Bite on its turn. Head remains active for 1d4 rounds or until killed.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Potent Poison
special_abilities.desc: A creature that normally has resistance to poison doesn’t have resistance to the tigebra’s poison. If a creature normally has immunity to poison it has resistance to the tigebra’s poison instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 15 ft., one creature,. 27 (4d10+5) piercing damage + 10 (3d6) poison and the target must make DC 17 Con save or be poisoned for 1 min. While poisoned the creature suffers wracking pain that halves its speed. A poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns ending the effects on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 23 (4d8+5) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
bonus_actions.desc: Gazes on one creature it can see within 60' of it. If target can see it: paralyzed until end of its next turn (DC 17 Wis negates immune to tigebra’s Hypnotic Gaze 24 hrs).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Obsidian Axe or Firestorm Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Obsidian Axe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 19 (3d8+6) slashing damage + 3 (1d6) cold and 3 (1d6) fire.

actions.name: Firestorm Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 13 (3d6+3) fire + 10 (3d6) cold.

actions.name: Lava Geyser (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Gestures at a point on the ground it can see within 60' of it. A fountain of molten rock erupts from that point in a 10 ft. radius 40' high cylinder. The area is difficult terrain for 1 min. Each creature in the cylinder must make a DC 16 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 24 (7d6) fire and is coated in hardened lava. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn’t coated in hardened lava. A creature coated in hardened lava has its speed halved while it remains coated. A creature including the coated creature can take its action to break and remove the hardened lava ending the effect.

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint by scent the location of creatures that have blood within 60' of it.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 30' and its high jump is up to 15 feet with or with o a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage and the flea attaches to the target. While attached the flea doesn’t attack. Instead at the start of each of the flea’s turns the target loses 4 (1d4+2) hp due to blood loss. The flea can detach itself by spending 5 ft. of movement. It does so after draining 12 hp of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature including the target can take its action to detach the flea by succeeding on a DC 11 Str check.

bonus_actions.name: Leaping Escape
bonus_actions.desc: Leaps up to 15 ft. with o provoking opportunity attacks.

name: Hvalfiskr
senses: blindsight 120' (whale form only), darkvision 120' passive Perception 17

special_abilities.name: Echolocation (Whale Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: No blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 1 hr.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Cetaceans
special_abilities.desc: Can communicate with dolphins porpoises and whales as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Four Bites or Slams; or three Chained Anchors.

actions.name: Bite (Whale Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 23 (5d6+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Chained Anchor (Giant or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +11 to hit 15 ft. or range 30/60' one target 28 (5d8+6) bludgeoning damage and anchor hooks around target. While hooked target and hvalfiskr can’t move over 60' apart. Creature including target can use action to detach anchor via DC 19 Str check. Or chain can be attacked (AC 18; hp 50; vulnerability to thunder; immunity to piercing poison and psychic) dislodging anchor into unoccupied space within 5 ft. of target and preventing Reel Anchor.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 24 (4d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whale Song (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Sings magical melody. Each hostile creature within 60' of it that can hear the song: 45 (10d8) psychic and charmed 1 min (DC 17 Wis half not charmed). Charmed creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If creature fails save by 5+ it also suffers short-term madness.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Transforms into Huge frost giant Huge whale or back into its true whale-giant hybrid form. Its stats are the same in each form. Items worn/carried transform with it. Reverts on death.

bonus_actions.name: Reel Anchor
bonus_actions.desc: Pulls on the chain connected to anchor returning it to its empty hand. If anchor is hooked around a creature creature: DC 19 Str save or be pulled up to 30' toward hvalfiskr.

name: Star-Nosed Diopsid
languages: Deep Speech, Undercommon, telepathy 100' (300' w/its own kind)

special_abilities.name: Mutagenic Venom
special_abilities.desc: Produces potent poison that envenoms Humanoid victim and slowly transforms it into new diopsid. While envenomed treats all diopsid as if charmed by them. Every 24 hrs that elapse victim : DC 16 Con save reducing hp max by 5 (2d4) on failure. Reduction lasts until creature finishes long rest after venom removed. Creature dies if this reduces hp max to 0. Humanoid that dies from this horrifically transformed becoming new diopsid and losing all memory of its former life. Poison remains within creature’s body until removed by greater restoration or similar.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Stinger attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 26 (4d10+4) piercing damage. If Humanoid succumbs to diopsid’s venom (DC 16 Con negates see Mutagenic Venom).

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 17 (3d8+4) bludgeoning damage. Target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it is an up to Large creature and diopsid doesn't have 2 grappled.

actions.name: Share Senses
actions.desc: While within 300' of an envenomed Humanoid diopsid sees through target’s eyes and hears what target hears until start of its next turn gaining benefits of any special senses target has. On subsequent turns diopsid can use a bonus action to extend duration of this effect until start of its next turn.

actions.name: Control Envenomed (3/Day)
actions.desc: While within 300' of an envenomed Humanoid diopsid can telepathically suggest course of activity to it. Humanoid must make DC 16 Wis save or pursue the activity suggested to it. Success: Humanoid takes 11 (2d10) psychic and has disadvantage next time it makes this save. Works like suggestion spell and Humanoid unaware of diopsid’s influence.

name: Ahu-Nixta Mechanon
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands Deep Speech and Void Speech but has limited speech

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Critical Malfunction
special_abilities.desc: Critical hit vs. mechanon: 20% chance of striking its soul chamber casing stunning it until end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Soul Reactivation
special_abilities.desc: Reduced to 0 hp stops functioning becoming inert. For the next hr if a Small or larger creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead dies within 30' of a deactivated mechanon a portion of creature’s soul is absorbed by mechanon and construct reactivates regaining all its hp + additional hp equal to the dead creature’s CR. If it remains inert for 1 hr it is destroyed and can’t be reactivated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Utility Arms or one Slam and one Utility Arm.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Utility Arm
actions.desc: Uses one of the following attack options:Grabbing Claw Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage. If target is a creature is grappled by mechanon (escape DC 13). Until grapple ends creature restrained mechanon can’t use Claw on another target. Sonic Disruptor Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 9 (2d6+2) thunder. If target is a creature: DC 12 Con save or incapacitated until end of its next turn.Telekinetic Projector Mechanon fires a ray at a target it can see within 60'. If target is a creature: DC 13 Str save or mechanon moves it up to 30' in any direction. If target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn’t being worn or carried it is moved up to 30' in any direction. Mechanon can use projector to manipulate simple tools or open doors and containers.

actions.name: Adapt Appendage
actions.desc: Swaps its Utility Arm with Utility Arm of any other mechanon within 5 ft. of it.

actions.name: Repair (2/Day)
actions.desc: Touches an ahu-nixta or a Construct. Target regains 11 (2d8+2) hp.

name: Sinstar Thrall
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned

special_abilities.name: Spiny Defense
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the star thrall or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) piercing damage and must make DC 13 Con save or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Telepathic Bond
special_abilities.desc: While the star thrall is on the same plane of existence as the sinstar that created it the star thrall can magically convey what it senses to the sinstar and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shoot Spines (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Sprays spines in a burst around itself. Each creature within 15 ft. of it must make a DC 13 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 10 (3d6) piercing damage and is paralyzed until the end of its next turn. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn’t paralyzed.

special_abilities.name: Commanding Bulk
special_abilities.desc: While enlarged each friendly creature within 30' of it can’t be charmed or frightened.
[+]Evasion[/+] If subject to effect that allows Dex save for half damage takes none on success half if it fails. Can’t use while enlarged.

special_abilities.name: Magic
special_abilities.desc: [+]Resistance[/+] Advantage: spell/magic effect saves. Can’t use this trait while enlarged.

special_abilities.name: Reduce
special_abilities.desc: If it starts its turn enlarged it can choose to end the effect and return to its normal size (no action required).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: War Bellow then three Tulwars or four Darts.

actions.name: Tulwar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (1d8+5) slashing damage or 14 (2d8+5) slashing damage if enlarged.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 20/60' one target 7 (1d4+5) piercing damage or 10 (2d4+5) piercing damage if enlarged.

actions.name: War Bellow
actions.desc: Releases a loud challenging bellow. Each hostile creature within 60' of the raja that can hear the bellow:  frightened (DC 15 Cha negates). A frightened creature can re-save at end of each of its turns ending effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s save is successful or effect ends for it creature is immune to raja’s War Bellow for the next 24 hrs.

bonus_actions.name: Enlarge
bonus_actions.desc: Magically increases in size with anything worn/carried. While enlarged is Large 2× damage dice on weapon attacks (included above) and makes Str checks and Str saves with advantage. Enlarged can no longer use Evasion and Magic Resistance. If it lacks room to become Large this action fails.

special_abilities.name: Aura of Courage and Protection
special_abilities.desc: If conscious friendly creatures within 10 ft. of it immune to frightened and advantage on all saves.

special_abilities.name: Divine Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When commander hits with any weapon weapon deals extra 3d8 necrotic or radiant (included below) commander’s choice.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Battle Cry if available. Then three Longswords or two Longswords and uses Spellcasting. If commander hits one creature with two Longswords target: DC 16 Con save or be stunned until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage or 9 (1d10+4) slashing damage if used with 2 hands + 13 (3d8) necrotic or radiant (commander’s choice).

actions.name: Battle Cry (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Commander shouts a frightful and rallying battle cry. Each hostile creature within 30 of it that can hear the cry: DC 16 Wis save or be frightened for 1 min. A frightened creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. Each friendly creature within 30' of the commander and that can hear the cry has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before start of commander’s next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 16): At will: command protection from evil and good3/day ea: cure wounds (level 3) find steed (as an action)1/day: revivify

reactions.name: Bolster Soldier
reactions.desc: When a friendly creature the field commander can see is hit with weapon attack the commander calls out encouragement and creature gains 5 (1d10) temp hp.

special_abilities.name: Ethereal Sight
special_abilities.desc: Can see 60' into the Ethereal Plane when on the Material Plane and vice versa.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (2d10+4) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) force. Target is grappled (escape DC 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature and drake doesn’t have another creature grappled.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Phase Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales a blue mist in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 27 (6d8) force and is magically shifted to the Ethereal Plane for 1 min (DC 15 Con half damage and isn’t magically shifted). A creature shifted to the Ethereal Plane in this way can re-save at end of each of its turns magically shifting back to the Material Plane on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Ethereal Step
bonus_actions.desc: Magically shifts from Material Plane to Ethereal or vice versa. Drake can bring creatures grappled by it into the Ethereal Plane with it. A creature not native to Ethereal Plane returns to Material Plane in 1d4 rounds if brought to the plane while grappled by drake.

special_abilities.name: Bountiful Death
special_abilities.desc: When the tripwire patch reduces a creature to 0 hp nearby plants erupt with growth. Plants within 20' of the body become thick overgrown difficult terrain and all plants within a 2-mile radius centered on the point where the creature was killed become enriched for 7 days for each CR of the slain creature (minimum of 7 days) cumulatively increasing in duration each time the patch kills a creature. Enriched plants yield twice the normal amount of food when harvested.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from normal patch of foliage such as flowers or bushes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Bite attacks or one Bite attack and two Tripwire Vine attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tripwire Vine
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 20 ft., one creature,. 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage and the target must make DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone and pulled up to 15 ft. toward the tripwire patch.

reactions.name: No Escape
reactions.desc: If a prone creature within 5 ft. of patch stands up from prone patch can make one Bite vs. it.

special_abilities.name: Celestial Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals an extra 4d8 force (included below).

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn but attacks vs. it have advantage until start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If it takes 30 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hp it is reduced to 1 hp instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Greataxe attacks. When Thunderous Roar is available it can use the roar in place of one Greataxe attack.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 18 (2d12+5) slashing damage + 13 (3d8) force.

actions.name: Thunderous Roar (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Unleashes a terrifying roar in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 36 (8d8) thunder (DC 16 Con half). In addition each hostile creature within 60' of archon that can hear it: DC 15 Wis save or be frightened for 1 min. Creatures in the 30' cone have disadvantage on this save. A frightened creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

reactions.name: Rallying Roar
reactions.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hp it can utter a triumphant roar. Each friendly creature within 60' of the archon that is frightened paralyzed stunned or unconscious has advantage on its next save. A friendly creature with o those conditions has advantage on its next attack roll. In addition each friendly creature within 60' of archon that can hear the roar gains 14 (4d6) temp hp.

special_abilities.name: Angelic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 5d8 radiant (included below).

special_abilities.name: Aura of Balance
special_abilities.desc: Affects chance and probability around it. While creature within 20' of it can’t have advantage or disadvantage on any ability check attack roll or save. Aura affects zirnitran. At start of each of its turns zirnitran chooses whether this aura is active.

special_abilities.name: Divine Awareness
special_abilities.desc: Knows if it hears a lie.

special_abilities.name: Dragon Watcher
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: saves vs. dragon breath weapons. No damage if it succeeds on such a save and only half if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Hardened Scales
special_abilities.desc: Any critical hit vs. it becomes a normal hit.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Choose to succeed failed save.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Glimpse from the Heavens
special_abilities.desc: Its eyes flash with the majesty of a solar eclipse. Each creature of its choice that is within 60' of it and that can see it: DC 19 Wis save or frightened for 1 min. Creature can re-save at end of each of its turns ending the effect on a success. If save is successful or effect ends for it creature is immune to zirnitran’s Glimpse of the Heavens for the next 24 hrs. A creature that fails by 5+ is also blinded. Blindness lasts until removed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

special_abilities.name: Secrets of the Hidden Hoard (2/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Draws upon ages of study and observation and casts one spell of 8th level or lower that appears on the cleric or wizard spell list. Casts the spell as an action regardless of spell’s normal casting time.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: Wis (DC 21) no material components: At will: detect evil and good invisibility (self only) legend lore thaumaturgy3/day ea: dispel evil and good geas (as an action)1/day ea: antimagic field plane shift

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Glimpse from the Heavens then three Anointed Claws or Draconic Blasts.

actions.name: Anointed Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage and 22 (5d8) radiant.

actions.name: Draconic Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +13 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 29 (5d8+7) radiant. Can choose to deal acid cold fire lightning or poison instead of radiant.

actions.name: Sacred Flame Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales holy fire in a 90' cone. Each creature in that area: 33 (6d10) fire and 33 (6d10) radiant (DC 20 Dex half). Also the holy fire burns away magic ending any spell of 7th-level or lower in the area.

reactions.name: Six-Scaled Aegis
reactions.desc: When it takes damage it gains resistance to that type of damage including the triggering damage for 1 min or until it uses this reaction again.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: Knows location of each dragon and each creature with strong connection to dragons such as a sorcerer with the draconic bloodline within 120' of it.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Flies up to half its fly speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Makes one Anointed Claws or Draconic Blast attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Uses Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Under Black Wings (3)
legendary_actions.desc: Creates a magical feathered shield around itself or another creature it can see within 120' of it. Target gains +2 to AC and 20 temp hp until the end of zirnitran’s next turn.

special_abilities.name: Armor of Foresight
special_abilities.desc: While it is wearing no armor and wielding no shield its AC includes its Dex and Wis modifiers (included above).

special_abilities.name: Divine Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 3d8 necrotic or radiant (included below) servant’s choice.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses its Awe-Inspiring Presence. Then 3 Divine Bursts or 1 Blinding Rod and 2 Divine Bursts. It can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Blinding Rod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (2d6+1) bludgeoning damage + 13 (3d8) necrotic or radiant (the first servant’s choice) and target must make DC 17 Con save or be blinded and deafened until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Divine Burst
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit 5 ft. or range 120' one target 23 (4d8+5) necrotic or radiant (the first servant’s choice).

actions.name: Awe-Inspiring Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of servant's choice within 30' of it and aware of it: DC 17 Wis save or unable to use bonus actions or reactions until start of servant’s next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 17): At will: bane protection from evil and good spare the dying thaumaturgy3/day ea: cure wounds (level 5) dispel evil and good divination speak with dead1/day ea: commune (as an action) holy aura resurrection

bonus_actions.name: Healing Hands (Recharge 5–6)
bonus_actions.desc: Touches a creature within 5 ft. of it: creature regains 14 (4d6) hp.

special_abilities.name: Calming Presence
special_abilities.desc: A creature that enters a space within 5 ft. of weevil or that starts its turn there: DC 13 Cha save or be indifferent to all creatures that it is hostile toward while it remains within 60' of weevil. This indifference ends if the creature is attacked or harmed by a spell or if it witnesses any of its allies being harmed.

special_abilities.name: Diligent Preservation
special_abilities.desc: A creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead and that starts its turn with 0 hp within 60' of weevil becomes stable. In addition any corpse within 60' of weevil is protected from decay and can’t become Undead while it remains within 60' of weevil and for 24 hrs after it leaves the area.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d8+1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Glue Glob
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit 30/60' one target 7 (2d6) acid. Target restrained for 1 min (DC 13 Dex its speed is halved for 1 min instead). Target can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Regenerative Spittle (3/Day)
actions.desc: Launches spittle at one creature it can see within 10 ft. of it. Target regains 2 (1d4) hp. For 1 min target regains 1 hp at the start of each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Devil’s Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the moldering devil’s darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Field Hopper
special_abilities.desc: The moldering devil can fly up to 40' on its turn but it must start and end its movement on a solid surface such as a roof or the ground. If it is flying at the end of its turn it falls to the ground and takes falling damage.

special_abilities.name: Rotting Death
special_abilities.desc: When it dies all foodstuffs water and beverages within 100' of it are subjected to the devil’s Touch of Rot trait.

special_abilities.name: Touch of Rot
special_abilities.desc: Any foodstuff water or beverage whether fresh or preserved that comes into contact with the moldering devil immediately decays and becomes inedible or undrinkable. If a creature consumes such food or drink it must make a DC 11 Con save. On a failure it takes 7 (2d6) poison and is poisoned for 24 hrs. On a success it takes half the damage and is poisoned for 1 hr.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) necrotic.

special_abilities.name: Deep Roots
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Str and Dex saves made vs. effects that would move it vs. its will along the ground.

special_abilities.name: Dozens of Eyes
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on saves vs. being blinded. In addition if the tuberkith isn’t blinded creatures attacking it can’t benefit from traits and features that rely on a creature’s allies distracting or surrounding the tuberkith such as the Pack Tactics trait or Sneak Attack feature.

actions.name: Peeler
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Masher
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it must make DC 12 Str save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Gains 3 hp at the start of its turn. If the trollkin takes acid or fire this ability doesn’t function at the start of its next turn. It dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Thick Skin
special_abilities.desc: Its skin is thick and tough granting it a +1 bonus to Armor Class (already factored into its AC).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Greatsword attack and two Slam attacks or it makes three Throwing Axe attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Throwing Axe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/60' one target 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Impregnable Counter
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 ft. of the ironmonger misses a melee attack vs. it the attacker must make DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Dismembering Strike
special_abilities.desc: If it scores a critical hit vs. stunned creature tears off one of creature’s limbs. Creature is immune to this if it is immune to slashing.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Forest and Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: Dex (Stealth) checks to hide in forest terrain if fur is brown and snowy terrain if fur is white.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Claw. If it hits one creature with two attacks creature takes 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and must make DC 15 Con save or be stunned until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (1d8+7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d6+7) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Versatile Coat
bonus_actions.desc: White fur white to brown vice versa.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on melee attack rolls vs. a creature that doesn’t have all its hp.

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One attack with its beak and one attack with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (1d10+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Death Malison
special_abilities.desc: When it dies the runes on its body flash a bright green then turn to mundane malachite. Each creature within 20' of giant: cursed 7 days (DC 16 Con negates) or until lifted by remove curse spell or similar. While cursed creature has disadvantage on saves and on first attack roll it makes on each of its turns. Fiends have disadvantage on the save.

special_abilities.name: Rune-Powered Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon weapon deals extra 2d8 fire (included in below).

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Greatclub or Runic Blast attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 19 (3d8+6) bludgeoning damage + 9 (2d8) fire.

actions.name: Runic Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 25 (4d10+3) force and target's speed halved until end of its next turn (DC 16 Con not half speed). Fiends have disadvantage on the save.

actions.name: Invisibility Rune
actions.desc: Magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the giant wears or carries is invisible with it.

reactions.name: Runic Shield
reactions.desc: Adds 4 to its AC vs. one attack that would hit it as green runes encircle the giant. To do so giant must see the attacker and can’t be invisible

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from bed of lotus flowers.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn grappled by the mortifera must make DC 15 Con save or be poisoned for 1 min. A poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Fanged Tentacles and two Slams or it makes three Slams. It can replace two Slams with Chomp.

actions.name: Fanged Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 9 (2d4+4) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) poison and target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends the target is restrained and mortifera can’t use its Fanged Tentacles on another.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (1d12+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.desc: One creature grappled by mortifera is pulled up to 5 ft. to mortifera’s central maw which chomps on creature. Target: 10 (3d6) piercing damage and 13 (3d8) poison (DC 15 Str half).

actions.desc: Sprays poison from its central maw in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 27 (6d8) poison (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Frozen to the Spot
special_abilities.desc: When on snow or ice the birgemon seal can’t be moved vs. its will.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 90 min.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack one Toothy Maw attack and three Tendril attacks. It can replace all three Tendril attacks with use of Reel.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Toothy Maw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 15 ft., one target, The target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a Med or smaller creature and the seal can’t use the same tendril on another target. If a creature is grappled by two or more tendrils it is also Restrained.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: Pulls each creature grappled by it up to 10 ft. straight toward it.

bonus_actions.name: Ice Slide
bonus_actions.desc: If the birgemon seal moves at least 10 ft. in a straight line while on snow or ice during its turn it can slide up to 40 feet.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 20 (3d10+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit 60/240' 20 (3d10+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grab
actions.desc: Reaches out and grabs a Med or smaller creature it can see within 10 ft. of it. The target must make DC 15 Dex save or be grappled (escape DC 15) by the giant. Until this grapple ends the target is restrained.

actions.name: Throw
actions.desc: Throws a creature it is grappling at a space it can see within 30' of it. The thrown creature takes 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and must make DC 15 Dex save or land prone. If the target space is occupied by another creature that creature must make DC 15 Dex save or take 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Angelic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 4d8 radiant (included below).

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Living Coral Armor
special_abilities.desc: Its armor is made of living coral. If armor is damaged such as from a black pudding’s Pseudopod armor fully repairs itself within 1 min provided it wasn’t destroyed.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage + 18 (4d8) radiant. If deva makes a ranged attack with its trident trident returns to its hands at start of its next turn.

actions.name: Transforming Touch (5/Day)
actions.desc: Can magically polymorph a willing creature into a giant octopus hunter shark or plesiosaurus. Transformation lasts 8 hrs until target uses a bonus action to transform back into its true form or until target dies. Items target is wearing/carrying are absorbed into new form. In new form target retains its alignment and Int Wis and Cha scores as well as its ability to speak. Its other stats are replaced by those of its new form and it gains any capabilities that new form has but it lacks.

bonus_actions.name: Anoxic Aura (1/Day)
bonus_actions.desc: Removes oxygen from nearby water for 1 min. Each creature that requires oxygen to live (including air-breathing creatures under effects of water breathing) and starts its turn within 20' of deva: DC 17 Con save or begin suffocating. Deva never suffers effects of this; can choose any creatures in area to ignore it.

special_abilities.name: Beast Passivism
special_abilities.desc: No beast with Int 3 or less can willingly attack the crone. They can be forced to do so through magical means.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
special_abilities.desc: Can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Staff attacks.

actions.name: Wild Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 4 (1d8) force.

actions.name: Needle Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales pine needles in a 30' cone. Each creature in the area: 28 (8d6) piercing damage (DC 15 Dex half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 15). Prepared: At will: minor illusion tree stride3/day ea: goodberry hold person locate animals or plants1/day ea: commune with nature remove curse

reactions.name: Transmigratory Strike
reactions.desc: When she kills a Humanoid can immediately restore it to life as a Beast with CR no higher the Humanoid’s CR or level. Otherwise works as reincarnate spell.

name: Brain Coral
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, prone

special_abilities.name: Colony Cluster
special_abilities.desc: Consists of Huge central spire and 3 Small clusters. Each cluster acts on coral’s turn and shares its move allowing spire and clusters to swim total of 120' on coral’s turn. Cluster can’t move more than 120' from spire. Cluster over 120' away from spire for over 24 hrs enters dormant state becoming new brain coral after 30 days. Brain coral and its clusters share hp and damage dealt to cluster or spire reduces shared total. If more than one section of coral is included in damaging spell or effect (ex: Dragon’s breath weapon or lightning bolt spell) coral makes one save and takes damage as if only one section was affected. When coral takes 15+ damage in one turn cluster is destroyed. At end of its turn if coral took damage on previous turn it can expel one new cluster from spire per 15 damage it took. Can’t have more than 5 clusters active at a time.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Pseudopod from spire and one additional Pseudopod per cluster it has. Additional Pseudopods can originate from central spire or any cluster provided target is within reach of attack’s origin.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reef Poison Spray (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Expels poison cloud. Each creature within 15 ft. of central spire: 21 (6d6) poison and is incapacitated until end of its next turn (DC 15 Int half damage not incapacitated).

actions.name: Beasts of the Sea (1/Day)
actions.desc: Magically calls 2d4 giant crabs 2 giant sea horses or reef sharks or 1 swarm of quippers provided coral is underwater. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds acting as allies of coral and obeying its telepathic commands. Beasts remain 1 hr until coral dies or until coral dismisses them as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Pierce the Veil
special_abilities.desc: When a creature catonoctrix can see is stunned by Mind Ravage catonoctrix learns one secret the creature knows.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Claws or it makes three Psychic Bolts. It can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (3d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) psychic.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (3d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Psychic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 18 (4d6+4) psychic.

actions.name: Mind Ravage (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Unleashes a torrent of psychic energy. Each creature within 20' of catonoctrix: 45 (10d8) psychic and is stunned for 1 min (DC 16 Int half damage and isn’t stunned). A stunned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
actions.desc: Int (DC 15) no spell components: At will: detect thoughts divination1/day ea: confusion scrying suggestion

reactions.name: Precognitive Dodge
reactions.desc: Adds 4 to its AC vs. one attack that would hit it. To do so it must see the attacker and be within 30' of it.

special_abilities.name: Acidic Coating
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches the crawler or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 9 (2d8) acid.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Snow Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through ice snow and permafrost and leaves a 5 ft. diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 2 Bites and 1 Tail Spike or 3 Superheated Acid Spits.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one creature,. 16 (2d10+5) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) acid.

actions.name: Tail Spike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one creature,. 19 (4d6+5) piercing damage. Target is grappled (escape DC 17) if it is a Large or smaller creature and crawler doesn’t have another creature grappled.

actions.name: Superheated Acid Spit
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 60 ft., one creature,. 12 (2d8+3) acid + 9 (2d8) fire.

actions.name: Acidic Spray (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Spews superheated digestive juices in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 18 (4d8) acid and 18 (4d8) fire and is coated in heated acid (DC 17 Dex half damage and isn’t coated in acid). A creature coated in heated acid takes 4 (1d8) acid and 4 (1d8) fire at start of each of its turns. A creature including coated target can take its action to wash or scrub off the acid ending the effect.

special_abilities.name: Pandemonium Fruit
special_abilities.desc: Produces pitcher-shaped magical fruit. When creature picks fruit is subjected to Wondrous Cornucopia. Fruit withers 24 hrs after picking losing all magic. If creature expends spell slot of 3rd+ level or volunteers 2 Hit Dice of life (rolling them losing hp equal to result) while picking choose effect instead of random.

special_abilities.name: Wondrous Cornucopia
special_abilities.desc: A creature that picks a creeper’s fruit or is struck by Fruit Bomb triggers the fruit's chaotic magic. Roll d8: Butterfly Cloud Fuit explodes into a cloud of butterflies swirling out in 30' radius from fruit for 1 min making area heavily obscured.Restoration Creature eating the fruit ends one condition disease or reduction to one ability score or reduces exhaustion level by one.Poison Gas Fruit bursts into 20' radius red gas cloud centered on fruit. Area heavily obscured and lasts 1 min or until dispersed by strong wind. When creature enters cloud for first time on a turn or starts its turn there creature: 22 (5d8) poison (DC 16 Con half).Healing Creature eating fruit regains 22 (5d8) hp.Swarming Insects Fruit bursts releasing 2d4 swarms of insects.Protection Creature eating the fruit gains resistance to acid cold fire lightning poison or thunder (determined randomly) for 8 hrs.Squirrel Transformation Eaten: become squirrel 10 min (DC 16 Con).Cleansing All curses/diseases afflicting creature end when eaten.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Vine Whip attacks or two Fruit Bomb attacks.

actions.name: Vine Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 18 (4d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fruit Bomb
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 30/120' one target 31 (5d10+4) acid cold fire lightning poison or thunder (creeper’s choice). Instead of dealing damage creeper can choose for fruit to trigger its Wondrous Cornucopia. Treat target as if it ate fruit where applicable.

special_abilities.name: Death Trap
special_abilities.desc: When it dies its mandibles remain locked in place continuing to grapple beyond its death. Until grapple ends creature takes 4 (1d8) piercing damage at start of each of its turns as if the bug was still alive. Any creature can take an action to remove mandibles with successful DC 11 Str (Athletics) or Wis (Medicine) check.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hrs to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 20' and its high jump is up to 10 feet with or with o a running start.

special_abilities.name: Vicious Wound
special_abilities.desc: Its melee attacks score a critical hit on a 19 or 20.

actions.name: Barbed Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage. Target is grappled (escape DC 13) if it is a Med or smaller creature and bug doesn’t have another creature grappled. Until this grapple ends target takes 4 (1d8) piercing damage at start of each of its turns and bug can’t make Barbed Mandible attacks vs. other targets.

actions.name: Barbed Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Malleable Physiology
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn the atavist gains one of the following benefits until it ends the effect (no action required) or the start of its next turn:Darkvision out to a range of 30 feet.A climbing flying or swimming speed of 30 feet.Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.Bony spikes sprout along its skin and a creature that touches the atavist or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Keratin Blade or Bone Shard attacks. If both attacks hit one target the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage as bits of bone dig deeper into the target.

actions.name: Keratin Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bone Shard
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 30/120' one target 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the raptor moves at least 20' straight toward a creature and then hits it with Claw attack on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone the raptor can make one Bladed Feather attack vs. it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bladed Feather attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bladed Feather
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 5 ft. or range 30/90' one target 8 (1d10+3) slashing damage and the target’s speed is reduced by 10 ft. until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage.

name: Black Patch
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Eldritch Luminance
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that can see the patch starts its turn within 90' of it patch can force it to make a DC 15 Wis save if ooze isn’t incapacitated and can see the creature. Fail: creature is mesmerized 1 min. Mesmerized creature over 5 ft. away from patch must move on its turn toward ooze by most direct route trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn’t avoid opportunity attacks but before moving into damaging terrain such as lava or a pit and whenever it takes damage from a source other than ooze target can re-save. Mesmerized target can also re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If creature’s save succeeds or effect ends for it is immune to patch's Eldritch Luminance for next 24 hrs.

special_abilities.name: Flowing Form
special_abilities.desc: Can enter hostile creature’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1ft. wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Ooze Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 2 Pseudopods. Can replace 1 with Viscid Suffocation.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage + 13 (3d8) acid.

actions.name: Viscid Suffocation
actions.desc: One creature in patch’s space: DC 15 Dex save or take 18 (4d8) acid and patch attaches to it coating creature and its equipment. While patch is attached to it creature’s speed is halved can’t breathe and takes 9 (2d8) acid at start of each of its turns. Also if creature is in the water has disadvantage on ability checks to swim or stay afloat. Patch can devour flesh quickly but its acid doesn’t harm metal wood or similar objects or creatures with o flesh. Patch can detach itself by spending 5 ft. of move. A creature including target can take its action to detach patch via DC 15 Str check.

special_abilities.name: Diving Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If flying and moves 20'+ straight toward a creature and then hits it with claw on the same turn target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If target is prone drake can make one Bite vs. it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Gaseous Ascension
special_abilities.desc: Must regularly inhale swamp gases to maintain its flight. If it can’t breathe or isn’t in swampy terrain loses its fly speed. Also when it uses Poisonous Breath it loses its fly speed until Poisonous Breath recharges.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts
special_abilities.desc: Can communicate with Beasts native to swampland as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Swamp Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage and target must make DC 15 Con save or be poisoned for 1 min. Creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales poisonous swamp gas in 30' cone. Each creature in area: 27 (5d8) poison (DC 15 Con half). If drake is flying its Gaseous Ascension immediately ends takes falling damage as normal and each creature that failed save: poisoned 1 min. Poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

name: Clockwork Conductor
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Metronomic Aura
special_abilities.desc: When a friendly creature within 20' of conductor makes an attack or Cha (Performance) check creature can treat d20 roll as a 10 instead of die’s actual roll.

actions.name: Conductive Baton
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 3 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage + 4 (1d8) lightning and target can’t take reactions until start of its next turn.

actions.name: Overclocked Finale (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
actions.desc: Makes a grand sacrifice spurring its allies on in a final masterstroke. Each friendly creature within 30' of conductor that can see it gains a +5 bonus to attack rolls damage rolls and ability checks until the end of the conductor’s next turn. Roll a d6. On a 1 to 4 conductor can’t use Concerted Effort until it finishes a short rest. On a 5 or 6 it can’t use Concerted Effort and its Metronomic Aura becomes inactive until it finishes a short rest.

bonus_actions.name: Concerted Effort
bonus_actions.desc: Inspires itself or one friendly creature it can see within 30' of it until start of conductor’s next turn. When target makes an attack roll or a Con save to maintain concentration on a spell target can roll d4 and add result to attack or save.

name: Golem, Tar
damage_immunities: fire, poison, psychic; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, petrified, poisoned, prone
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Fire Hazard
special_abilities.desc: When it takes fire it bursts into flame. Golem continues burning until it takes cold is immersed in water or uses Quench. A creature that touches burning golem or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it: 5 (1d10) fire. While burning golem’s weapon attacks deal extra 5 (1d10) fire on a hit.

special_abilities.name: Hardened Tar
special_abilities.desc: If it takes cold in the same round it is reduced to 0 hp it is paralyzed for 1 min remaining alive. If it takes fire while paralyzed it regains a number of hp equal to the fire dealt. Otherwise it dies when the condition ends.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Noxious Smoke (Burning Only)
special_abilities.desc: While burning gives off poisonous fumes. A creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of burning golem: poisoned as it remains within 5 ft. of golem and for 1 round after it leaves the area (DC 13 Con negates).

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Quench (Burning Only)
bonus_actions.desc: Puts out fire on it deactivating Fire Hazard.

bonus_actions.name: Draw Flames
bonus_actions.desc: Extinguishes up to 10 ft. cube of nonmagical fire within 5 ft. of it drawing fire into itself and activating its Fire Hazard.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

special_abilities.name: Tenebrous Agility
special_abilities.desc: Its speed is doubled in dim light or darkness and it doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks when it moves provided it moves only in dim light or darkness. In addition when a creature that relies on sight attacks the umbral shambler while the shambler is in dim light or darkness the attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll.

special_abilities.name: Void Traveler
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink sleep or ambient pressure.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) slashing damage + 3 (1d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Twisted Step
actions.desc: Can project itself beyond reality for a short time. Until start of its next turn it can move through objects as if they were difficult terrain provided an object is no more than 3' thick and at least one side of the object is in dim light or darkness. It takes 5 (1d10) force if it starts its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage or 7 (1d10+2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit 80/320' one target 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Dig In
reactions.desc: Has resistance to one melee weapon attack that would hit it. To do so the avestruzii must see the attacker and must not have moved during its previous turn.

name: Yali
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from ordinary statue.

special_abilities.name: Flinging Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+straight toward a Large or smaller creature and then hits it with Tusk on same turn target thrown up to 15 ft. in a random direction and knocked prone (DC 12 Str negates throw and prone). If thrown target strikes a solid surface target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage per 10 ft. it was thrown.
