If target is thrown at another creature creature takes same damage and knocked prone (DC 12 Dex negates both).

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: Long jump is up to 40' and its high jump is up to 20' with or with o a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Tusk attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d6+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d4+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trumpeting Blast (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Unleashes a warbling sound in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in area: 10 (4d4) thunder and is deafened for 1 min (DC 12 Con half damage and not deafened). A deafened creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Blur of Motion
special_abilities.desc: When it moves at least 30' on its turn ranged attack rolls vs. it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Chain Breaker
special_abilities.desc: Deals 2× damage to objects that restrain creatures.

special_abilities.name: Evasion
special_abilities.desc: If subject to effect that allows Dex save for half damage takes no damage on success and only half if it fails.

special_abilities.name: Freedom of Movement
special_abilities.desc: Ignores difficult terrain and magical effects can’t reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 ft. of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight toward creature and hits it with Claw on same turn target knocked prone (DC 15 Str negates). If target prone cyonaxin can make one Bite attack vs. it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 16 (3d6+6) piercing damage + 10 (3d6) radiant.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (3d4+6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Yowl (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Each hostile creature within 60' of it and can hear it: DC 15 Wis save or frightened 1 min. Creature grappling or restraining another has disadvantage. Creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Liberating Churr (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Each friendly creature within 90' and can hear it gains benefits of its Freedom of Movement. All affected grow claws for unarmed strikes. If affected creature hits with claw deals 1d6+its Str modifier slashing instead of bludgeoning normal for unarmed strike. Lasts until start of cyonaxin’s next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Free Runner
bonus_actions.desc: Can take the Dash action.

special_abilities.name: Feybane Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapons are cold iron and are magical when used vs. fey. When it hits a fey with any weapon the weapon’s damage is force instead of its normal damage type.

special_abilities.name: Fey Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint by scent the location of fey within 60' of it and can sense the general direction of fey within 1 mile of it.

special_abilities.name: Soft Wings
special_abilities.desc: Can fly up to 40' on its turn but must start and end its move on solid surface (roof ground etc.). If it is flying at the end of its turn it falls to the ground and takes falling damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Extractor Spear or Disorienting Chitter attacks.

actions.name: Extractor Spear
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) necrotic. Target's hp max is reduced by amount equal to half necrotic taken and thripper regains hp equal to that amount. Reduction lasts until target finishes short/long rest. Target dies if this reduces its hp max to 0.

actions.name: Disorienting Chitter
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 16 (3d8+3) thunder and the target must make DC 14 Wis save or fall prone as it briefly becomes disoriented and falls.

reactions.name: Glamour Counter
reactions.desc: When creature thripper can see within 30' of it casts spell can counter the spell. This works like counterspell spell with +6 spellcasting ability check except thripper can counter only enchantment or illusion spells and it must make the ability check regardless of spell’s level.

special_abilities.name: Sand Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The sand dragon has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.

special_abilities.name: Sandy Nature
special_abilities.desc: Is infused with elemental power and it requires only half the air food and drink that a typical dragon if its size needs.

special_abilities.name: Stinging Sand
special_abilities.desc: The first time it hits a target with melee weapon attack target: DC 13 Con save or have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d10+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Uses one of the following:Sand Blast. Exhales superheated sand in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in area: 11 (2d10) piercing damage and 11 (2d10) fire (DC 13 Dex half). Blinding Sand. Breathes fine sand in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in area: blinded for 1 min (DC 13 Con negates). Blinded creature can take an action to clear its eyes of sand ending effect for it.

special_abilities.name: Disease Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint location of poisoned creatures or creatures suffering from a disease within 60' of her and can sense general direction of such creatures within 1 mile of her.

special_abilities.name: Pestilence Aura
special_abilities.desc: At start of each of hag’s turns each creature within 10 ft. of her takes 4 (1d8) poison. If a creature remains within aura for more than 1 min it contracts disease of hag’s choice (DC 13 Con negates disease). Disease’s save DC is 13 regardless of type.

special_abilities.name: Plague Carrier
special_abilities.desc: The pesta hag is immune to diseases.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Pestilence Rake or Poison Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Pestilence Rake
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage + 5 (2d4) necrotic. Target: DC 13 Con save or its hp max is reduced by amount equal to necrotic taken and it contracts sewer plague sight rot or other disease of hag’s choice. Disease’s save DC 13 regardless of type.

actions.name: Poison Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) poison.

actions.name: Curative Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: Touched target magically regains 10 (2d8+1) hp and freed from any disease or poison afflicting it.

actions.name: Summon Plague Rats (1/Day)
actions.desc: Magically calls 1d3 rat swarms. Arrive in 1d4 rounds act as hag allies and obey her spoken commands. Swarms carry a terrible disease. If creature takes damage from swarm’s Bites: DC 10 Con save or contract the disease. Until disease is cured creature can’t regain hp except by magically and target’s hp max decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hrs. If creature’s hp max drops to 0 as a result of this disease it dies. Rats remain 1 hr until hag dies or hag dismisses them as bonus action.

name: Blood Flurry
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint by scent the location of creatures that aren’t Undead or Constructs within 30' of it.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from collection of snowflakes whether resting on the ground or carried by natural winds. It loses this trait if it has consumed blood in the last 24 hrs.

special_abilities.name: Rust Vulnerability
special_abilities.desc: The large amount of iron in its diet makes it susceptible to effects that harm ferrous metal such as the rust monster’s Antennae.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and flurry can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny crystalline Aberration. Can't regain hp or gain temp hp.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Free Bleeding Cuts attacks.

actions.name: Free Bleeding Cuts
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit 0' 1 tgt in the swarm’s space. 27 (6d8) slashing damage or 13 (3d8) slashing damage if flurry has half of its hp or fewer. If target is a creature other than an Undead or a Construct: DC 16 Con save or lose 13 (3d8) hp at start of each of its turns due to a bleeding wound. Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with successful DC 12 Wis (Medicine) check. Wound also closes if target receives magical healing.

name: Howler Of The Hill
languages: understands Abyssal, Common, Infernal, and Void Speech but can’t speak, telepathy 120'

special_abilities.name: Hungry Void Traveler
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Inscrutable
special_abilities.desc: Immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts and any divination spell it refuses. Wis (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions/sincerity have disadvantage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Claw or Psychic Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 15 (2d8+6) slashing damage + 13 (3d8) psychic.

actions.name: Psychic Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 26 (5d8+4) psychic.

actions.name: Gloaming Howl
actions.desc: Emits a magical howl that changes in melody and frequency depending on light around it. Each creature of howler’s choice within 120' of it and can hear howl: DC 18 Wis save or succumb to effects of one of the following. If creature’s save succeeds/effect ends for it creature is immune to that particular howl for next 24 hrs. Bright Howl When howler is in bright light each target that fails the save is incapacitated until end of its next turn. Dim Howl When howler is in dim light each target that fails the save is stunned until end of its next turn.Dark Howl When howler is in darkness each target that fails the save drops whatever it is holding and is paralyzed with fear for 1 min. A paralyzed creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Otherworldly Hunter
actions.desc: Transport itself to a different plane of existence. Works like plane shift except howler can affect only itself and can’t use this to banish unwilling creature to another plane.

name: Demon, Leech
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; nonmagic B/P/S attacks

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: Can pinpoint by scent the location of creatures that aren’t Constructs or Undead within 30' of it.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Tentacle Bites or two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 14 (3d6+4) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) necrotic.

actions.name: Tentacle Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage and 4 (1d8) necrotic and demon can attach its tentacle to target. Has two tentacles each of which can attach to only one target. While tentacle is attached demon can’t use that tentacle to make Tentacle Bites target is restrained and demon doesn’t attack with it. Instead at start of each of demon’s turns each creature with tentacle attached loses 11 (2d6+4) hp due to blood loss and demon gains equal temp hp equal. Demon can add temp hp gained from this attack together and can add it to temp hp gained from Release Swarm. Demon’s temp hp can’t exceed half its hp max. Demon can detach one or both tentacles as a bonus action. A creature including target can use its action to detach demon’s tentacle by succeeding on a DC 17 Str check.

actions.name: Release Swarm (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Shakes loose dozens of leeches creating a leech swarm. Swarm acts as ally of demon and obeys its spoken commands. Swarm remains for 1 min until demon dies or until demon dismisses it as a bonus action. If demon is within 5 ft. of the swarm it can use its action to consume the swarm gaining temp hp equal to swarm’s current hp. It can add temp hp gained this way with temp hp from Tentacle Bite. Demon’s temp hp can’t exceed half its hp max. Can have only one swarm active at a time.

special_abilities.name: Insanity
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on saves vs. being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Mortal Void Traveler
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air or ambient pressure.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

special_abilities.name: Void-Touched Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 1d6 cold and 1d6 force (included below).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Shortswords and one Void Tendril attack.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) cold and 3 (1d6) force.

actions.name: Void Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) cold and 3 (1d6) force. Target must make DC 15 Con save or its hp max is reduced by the amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until target finishes a long rest. Target dies if this reduces its hp max to 0.

actions.name: Void Speech Rant (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Spews a tirade of Void Speech. Each creature within 40' of it that can hear the tirade: 27 (5d10) psychic and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn (DC 15 Wis half damage and isn’t incapacitated).

name: Faux-Garou
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands creator's languages but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Druidic Vengeance
special_abilities.desc: Knows scent and appearance of each creature it was created to kill. Advantage on attacks vs. such creatures and on Wis (Perception) and Wis (Survival) checks to find and track them.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Necrotic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon deals extra 3d6 necrotic (included below).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Frightening Gaze then two Claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage + 10 (3d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Frightening Gaze
actions.desc: Fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 60' of it. Target frightened 1 min (DC 15 Wis negates). Creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If save succeeds or effect ends for it creature immune to faux-garou’s Frightening Gaze for the next 24 hrs.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Transforms into Large or smaller Beast matching type of lycanthrope it resembles (wolf if it resembles a werewolf etc.) or back into its true form. Its stats other than size and speed are same in each form. While transformed retains constructed appearance and claws at end of its forelimbs. Items worn or carried not transformed. Reverts to true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Beast of Burden
special_abilities.desc: Is considered to be a Huge Beast for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with use of Constricting Tail.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constricting Tail
actions.desc: A Large or smaller creature within 5 ft. of the lizard must make DC 12 Dex save or be grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained can’t breathe and begins to suffocate and the giant mole lizard can’t use Constricting Tail on another target.

bonus_actions.name: Mass Shove
bonus_actions.desc: Each Large or smaller creature within 10 ft. of the giant mole lizard and that isn’t grappled by it must make DC 14 Str save or be pushed up to 15 ft. away from the lizard and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Regains 10 hp at start of its turn. If it takes lightning or force this doesn’t work at its next turn start. Dies only if it starts turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Slam or Water Blast attacks. If it hits one Large or smaller creature with two Slam attacks the target must make DC 15 Str save or be flung up to 15 ft. to an unoccupied space the troll can see and knocked prone.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (3d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Water Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 11 (2d8+2) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) cold.

actions.name: Surge (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Pushes water surge in 30' line × 10 ft. wide. Each creature in line: 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage and pushed up to 15 ft. from troll in direction following line (DC 15 Str half not pushed). Surge lasts until start of troll’s next turn and any creature in line must spend 2 feet of move per 1 foot it moves when moving closer to troll. If troll uses this while underwater creatures in line have disadvantage on the save and any creature in line must spend 4 feet of move per 1 foot it moves when moving closer to troll.

special_abilities.name: Downdraft
special_abilities.desc: While it is flying area within 10 ft. of it is difficult terrain.

special_abilities.name: Glow
special_abilities.desc: The moth casts light from its abdomen shedding bright light in a 20' radius and dim light for an additional 20'.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Necrotic Dampening
special_abilities.desc: Each friendly creature within 30' of the moth has resistance to necrotic.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Proboscis attacks.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) radiant.

actions.name: Radiant Wind (Recharge 4–6)
actions.desc: Flaps its wings releasing magical wind in a 30' cone. Each creature in area: 21 (6d6) radiant and is flung up 15 ft. away from moth in a direction following cone and knocked prone (DC 15 Str half damage and isn’t flung or knocked prone). If a thrown target strikes an object such as a wall or floor target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage per 10 ft. it was thrown. If target is thrown into another creature that creature: DC 15 Dex save or take same damage and knocked prone.

name: Necrotech Reaver
languages: understands Common and Darakhul but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: Double damage to objects/structures.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Unstable Footing
special_abilities.desc: Has disadvantage on saves vs. being knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Chain Lash attacks.

actions.name: Chain Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 18 (4d6+4) slashing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The reaver has four chains each of which can grapple only one target.

actions.name: Bladed Sweep (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Swings its chains in a wide arc. Each creature within 15 ft. of the reaver must make a DC 15 Dex save. On a failure a creature takes 21 (6d6) slashing damage and is knocked prone. On a success a creature takes half the damage and isn’t knocked prone. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is pushed up to 15 ft. away from the reaver and knocked prone.

name: Savior Lumen
damage_resistances: acid, bludgeoning, cold, fire, piercing, radiant, slashing
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Fleeting Memory
special_abilities.desc: When it leaves creature’s sight creature must make DC 16 Wis save or remember swarm only as softly glowing lights.

special_abilities.name: Illumination
special_abilities.desc: Bright light in 20' radius and dim light an extra 20'.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature's space and vice versa and can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny celestial. Can't regain hp or gain temp hp.

special_abilities.name: Team Effort
special_abilities.desc: Considered to be a single Large creature to determine its carrying capacity and has advantage on Str checks made to push pull lift or break objects.

actions.name: Flurry of Tools
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit 0' 1 tgt in the swarm’s space. 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage + 10 (4d4) piercing damage and 10 (4d4) slashing damage or 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage + 5 (2d4) piercing damage and 4 (2d4) slashing damage if the swarm has half of its hp or fewer.

actions.name: Dismantle
actions.desc: Destroys up to a 5 ft. cube of nonmagical debris structure or object that isn’t being worn or carried.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 14) no material components: At will: floating disk mending spare the dying3/day ea: gentle repose knock sending1/day ea: locate creature passwall

name: Clockwork Pugilist
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: A clockwork pugilist doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Brass Onslaught (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The pugilist moves up to 10 ft. and makes one fist attack. If it hits the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

reactions.name: Get Down Sir!
reactions.desc: When a creature within 5 ft. of the pugilist is targeted by a ranged attack or spell the pugilist steps in the way and the ranged attack or spell targets the pugilist instead.
[+]Parry[/+] +2 to its AC vs. one melee attack that would hit it. Must see attacker and have at least one hand empty.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from large geode.

special_abilities.name: Final Form
special_abilities.desc: When it dies its corpse transforms into crystal and becomes a Large object that can be attacked and destroyed (AC 17; hp 45; immunity to poison and psychic). It can no longer be affected by spells and effects that target creatures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Crystal Limb attacks. It can replace one attack with use of Biomineralize.

actions.name: Crystal Limb
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage and it impales target on its limb grappling target (escape DC 14) if it is a Med or smaller creature. When this grapple ends target takes 9 (2d8) slashing damage. Crystallite has two Crystal Limbs each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Biomineralize
actions.desc: Absorbs lifeforce from one creature grappled by it. Target 14 (4d6) necrotic (DC 14 Con half). Target’s hp max is reduced by amount equal to necrotic taken and crystallite regains hp equal to that amount. Reduction lasts until target finishes a long rest. Target dies if this reduces its hp max to 0.

reactions.name: Calcify
reactions.desc: When it takes 5+ damage on a single turn it can reduce its hp max by an amount equal to damage taken and gains a +1 bonus to AC. Reduction and bonus last until it finishes a long rest. Can’t increase its AC above 20 using this.

name: Doppelixir
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: Move through space 1ft.+ wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from the liquid it imitates.

special_abilities.name: Ooze Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require sleep.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d6+3) bludgeoning damage and it attaches to target. While attached doppelixir doesn’t attack. Instead at start of each of doppelixir’s turns target loses 10 (2d6+3) hp to blood loss. Doppelixir can detach itself via 5 ft. of move. It does so after it drains 20 hp of blood from target or target dies. A creature including target can use its action to detach doppelixir via DC 13 Str check.

actions.name: Telepathic Urge
actions.desc: It mentally urges one creature it can see within 60' of it to attempt to drink it. Target: DC 11 Wis save or charmed 1 min. While charmed target must move on its turn toward doppelixir by safest available route trying to get within 5 ft. of doppelixir to drink it. Creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If doppelixir attacks target effect also ends. If target attempts to drink it doppelixir can use a reaction to make one Slam with advantage vs. target. If target’s save succeeds or effect ends for it creature immune to doppelixir’s Telepathic Urge for next 24 hrs.

bonus_actions.name: Imitative Liquid
bonus_actions.desc: Imitates one common or uncommon potion oil or other alchemical substance until it uses this bonus action again to end it or to imitate a different liquid. If it takes no acid fire or poison on the round it is slain creature can collect its remains which can be used as the liquid it was imitating as died.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts
special_abilities.desc: The barnyard dragonette can communicate with Beasts as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage. If target is a Small or smaller creature: DC 12 Str save or be grappled.

actions.name: Scale Rake
actions.desc: One creature grappled by it must make DC 12 Str save: 5 (2d4) slashing damage on a failed save or half damage if made.

actions.name: Gritty Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales a cloud of stinging dust in a 15 ft. cone. Each creature in the area: DC 12 Con save or be blinded 1 min. A blinded creature can repeat the save at end of each of its turns ending effect on itself on a success

special_abilities.name: Distracting Rattle
special_abilities.desc: Its shell plates rattle constantly creating a droning distracting noise. When a creature casts a spell with verbal component while within 30' of the troll that creature must make DC 15 Con save or lose the spell.

special_abilities.name: Night Hunters
special_abilities.desc: While in dim light or darkness has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Regains 10 hp at the start of its turn. If it takes fire this trait doesn’t function at start of its next turn. It dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage + 7 (2d6) poison. Target: DC 15 Con save or poisoned 1 min. While poisoned this way target can’t regain hp. Target can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Venom Spray (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Sprays its venom in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 28 (8d6) poison and is poisoned for 1 min (DC 15 Con half damage and isn’t poisoned). While poisoned in this way a creature can’t regain hp. A poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: Can’t use its blindsight while deafened or out of water.

special_abilities.name: Underwater Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: Dex (Stealth) underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Sonic Pulses or one Bite and two Slams.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 24 (4d8+6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 20 (4d6+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sonic Pulse
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 21 (4d8+3) thunder. Drake can use this action only while underwater.

actions.name: Buffeting Blast (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Exhales powerful stream of water in 60' line × 5 ft. wide. Each creature in line: 38 (7d10) bludgeoning damage and becomes disoriented for 1 min (DC 17 Dex half damage not disoriented). When a disoriented creature moves it moves in a random direction. It can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

bonus_actions.name: Manipulate Currents
bonus_actions.desc: While underwater changes water flow within 60' of it. Chooses one of below which lasts until start of its next turn.A 20' cube of rushing water forms on a point drake can see in the water. The cube’s space is difficult terrain and a creature that starts its turn swimming in the area must make DC 17 Str save or be pushed out of the cube directly away from drake.The current shoots in a 60' long 10 ft. wide line from drake in a direction it chooses. Each creature in area: pushed up to 15 ft. away from drake in a direction following the line (DC 17 Str negates).The drake takes the Dash action.

name: Dread Examiner
damage_immunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Choose to succeed failed save.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Otherworldly Form
special_abilities.desc: Its form is tentative in its cohesion as well as its adherence to physical laws. Immune to effects that cause the loss of limbs such as the effects of a sword of sharpness or vorpal sword. Immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 foot wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Psychic Awareness
special_abilities.desc: If it is being directly observed at the start of its turn it can immediately make a Wis (Perception) check to notice the observer. Once it has noticed the observer it always knows observer’s exact location regardless of cover obscurement or invisibility as long as observer is within 120' of examiner.

special_abilities.name: Sense Magic
special_abilities.desc: The dread examiner senses magic within 120' of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn’t itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Force Swipe or Force Blast attacks. It can replace one attack with use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Force Swipe
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +14 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 43 (8d8+7) force and target must make DC 20 Str save or be pushed up to 10 ft. in a direction of examiner’s choosing.

actions.name: Force Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +14 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 43 (8d8+7) force and target must make DC 20 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
actions.desc: Cha (DC 22) no spell components: At will: dispel magic fabricate (as an action) telekinesis3/day ea: animate objects wall of force1/day: true polymorph

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Magically teleports along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying up to 120' to an unoccupied spot it sees.

legendary_actions.name: Reform (2)
legendary_actions.desc: The dread examiner rearranges its disjointed parts and regains 36 (8d8) hp.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Surge (3)
legendary_actions.desc: The dread examiner releases a wave of psychic energy. Each creature within 20' of it: 21 (6d6) psychic can’t use reactions and has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn. (DC 20 Wis half damage and ignores the other effects.)

special_abilities.name: Invisibility Hat
special_abilities.desc: Its hat allows it to turn invisible. Works for another only if dokkaebi formally allows that creature to borrow it. A creature wearing hat with permission can use its Invisibility action. If hat is not returned when requested hat loses all magical properties.

special_abilities.name: Wrestler
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Str (Athletics) checks made to grapple and ability checks and saves made to escape a grapple.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three attacks with its club.

actions.name: Dokkaebi Bangmangi
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage. See below..

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: Magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Items wears or carries are invisible with it. Can’t use this if it doesn’t have its hat.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hrs to avoid suffocating.

special_abilities.name: Hypnotic Luminescence
special_abilities.desc: Tendril on giant’s head sheds bright light in 60' radius and dim light extra 60'. When creature that can see the light starts its turn within 60' of giant creature charmed 24 hrs (DC 18 Cha negates) regarding giant as friendly acquaintance. If giant or one of its allies harms charmed creature this effect ends. If save succeeds/effect ends for it creature immune to giant's Hypnotic Luminescence for next 24 hrs. At start of its turn lantern giant chooses whether this light is active.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Aquatic Creatures
special_abilities.desc: Communicate with Monstrosities and Beasts that have a swim speed as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Tridents. Can replace one with Spellcasting.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit 10 ft. or range 20/60' 1 target. 18 (3d6+8) piercing damage or 21 (3d8+8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Crush of the Deep (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Summons pressure of ocean depths in 40' cube of water centered on point it can see within 120' of it. Each creature in cube: 44 (8d10) bludgeoning damage (DC 17 Con half).

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 15) no material components:At will: detect magic identify (as an action)3/day ea: control water freedom of movement water breathing

special_abilities.name: Burning Cold
special_abilities.desc: A creature with resistance to cold doesn’t have resistance to the cold dealt by the frost-afflicted. A creature with immunity to cold is unaffected by this trait.

special_abilities.name: Icy Nature
special_abilities.desc: The frost-afflicted is infused with minor elemental power and it requires only half the amount of food and drink that a typical humanoid of its size needs.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Frigid Punch or Frost Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Frigid Punch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage and 5 (2d4) cold.

actions.name: Frost Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) cold.

reactions.name: Frigid Flare
reactions.desc: When a creature hits the frost-afflicted with weapon attack ice bursts from the frost-afflicted. Each creature within 5 ft. of the frost-afflicted must make a DC 13 Con save taking 5 (2d4) cold on a failed save or half damage if made.

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: Can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth/stone with o disturbing material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Final Gift
special_abilities.desc: When it dies it bursts in a shower of sand. A qumdaq of dying qumdaq’s choice within 10 ft. of it regains 5 (2d4) hp or target gains 5 (2d4) temp hp if at its max.

special_abilities.name: Horde Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on attack rolls vs. a creature if 1+ qumdaq’s ally is within 5 ft. of creature and ally isn’t incapacitated. Also qumdaq’s weapon attacks deal extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage on a hit if 3+ qumdaq’s allies are within 5 ft. of target and allies aren’t incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sense Magic
special_abilities.desc: Senses magic within 60' of it at will. This otherwise works like detect magic but isn’t itself magical.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Desiccation Field (1/Day)
actions.desc: Extends its arms sending sand and grit swirling around itself. Each non-qumdaq creature within 10 ft. of it: 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage and suffers one level of exhaustion for 1 hr or until it drinks 1+ pint of water (DC 10 Con half damage and isn’t exhausted). A creature can suffer no more than 3 total levels of exhaustion from Desiccation Field regardless of how many qumdaqs use the action.

special_abilities.name: Fiery Feathers
special_abilities.desc: Sheds 10 ft. radius bright light dim light extra 10 ft..

special_abilities.name: Rebirth (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If reduced to 0 hp it erupts in a burst of flame. Each creature within 10 ft. of it takes 3 (1d6) fire and the phoenixborn regains hp equal to the total damage taken.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 5 (1d6+2) fire.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Psychoactive Sweat
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the troll must make DC 13 Con save or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hp at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire this trait doesn’t function at the start of the troll’s next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks. It can replace its Bite attack with Sticky Tongue attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sticky Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 20 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage and the target must make DC 14 Str save or be pulled up to 15 ft. toward the troll.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

special_abilities.name: Polluted Aura
special_abilities.desc: Each creature in same water as hag and that starts its turn within 20' of hag: poisoned while within aura and for 1 min after it leaves (DC 16 Con not poisoned). A poisoned creature that starts its turn outside aura can re-save success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Skilled Submariner
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) and Wis (Survival) checks to find creatures and objects underwater. Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide while underwater.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Aquatic Creatures
special_abilities.desc: Communicate with Beasts and Monstrosities that have a swimming speed as if they shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Claw attacks and one Tail Slap attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) poison. Target incapacitated until the end of its next turn (DC 16 Con not incapacitated). If it fails the save by 5+ it is paralyzed instead.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 16 (2d12 +3) bludgeoning damage and target must make DC 16 Str save or pushed up to 10 ft. away from the hag.

actions.name: Shriek (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Unleashes a painful screeching in a 30' cone. Each creature in the area: 33 (6d10) thunder and is stunned until the end of its next turn (DC 16 Con half damage and isn’t stunned).

actions.name: Denizens of the Deep (1/Day)
actions.desc: Magically calls 4 reef sharks 2 swarms of quippers or 1 Beast of up to CR 2 with swim speed. Arrive in 1d4 rounds act as hag allies obeying her spoken commands. Beasts stay 1 hr until hag dies or until hag dismisses them as bonus action.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Cha (DC 16) no material components: At will: minor illusion  • 3/day ea: charm person major image1/day: control water

name: Swarm, Swamp Slirghs
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Puddle Jump
special_abilities.desc: Once on its turn can use 10 ft. of its move to step magically through body of water within reach and emerge from 2nd body of water within 60' of 1st appearing in unoccupied space within 5 ft. of 2nd. If in Huge or larger body of water can teleport to another location within same body of water.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of swarm: poisoned until start of its next turn. (DC 12 Con negates and creature immune to swarm’s Stench for 24 hrs).

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny elemental. Can’t regain hp or gain temp hp.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm’s space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) poison or 7 (2d6) piercing damage + 4 (1d8) poison if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

actions.name: Spit Swamp Sludge
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 20/60' one target 18 (4d8) poison or 9 (2d8) poison if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

actions.name: Soggy Relocation (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: While at least one creature is in swarm’s space swarm uses Puddle Jump attempting to pull one creature along for the ride. Target magically teleported with swarm to swarm’s destination (DC 13 Str negates).

name: Giant Flea Swarm
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Blood Sense
special_abilities.desc: The giant flea can pinpoint by scent the location of creatures that have blood within 60' of it.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Ravenous
special_abilities.desc: When a creature that doesn’t have all of its hp starts its turn in the swarm’s space that creature must make DC 12 Dex save or lose 5 (2d4) hp from blood loss.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The swarm’s long jump is up to 30' and its high jump is up to 15 feet with or with o a running start.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny flea. The swarm can’t regain hp or gain temp hp.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm’s space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Passage Guardian
special_abilities.desc: Can make an opportunity attack when a hostile creature moves within its reach as well as when a hostile creature moves out of its reach. It gets one extra reaction that be used only for opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: Turn Immunity
special_abilities.desc: Is immune to effects that turn undead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Scythe or Death Knell attacks.

actions.name: Scythe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 17 (2d10+6) slashing damage + 10 (3d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Death Knell
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 16 (3d8+3) necrotic or 22 (3d12+3) necrotic if the target is missing any of its hp.

actions.name: Grim Reaping (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Spins with its scythe extended and makes one Scythe attack vs. each creature within its reach. A creature that takes necrotic from this attack can’t regain hp until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Expert Wrestler
special_abilities.desc: Can grapple creatures that are two sizes larger than itself and can move at its full speed when dragging a creature it has grappled. If hunter grapples a Med or smaller creature target has disadvantage on its escape attempts. Hunter has advantage on ability checks and saves made to escape a grapple or end the restrained condition.

special_abilities.name: Hardy Defense
special_abilities.desc: While hunter is wearing no armor and wielding no shield its AC includes its Con modifier.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Can hold its breath for 30 min.

special_abilities.name: Leviathan Hunter
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) and Wis (Survival) checks to find and track Large or larger creatures with swimming speed.

special_abilities.name: Marine Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When it hits with any weapon weapon deals an extra 2d8 cold or poison (included below) hunter’s choice.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: In sunlight disadvantage on attacks and Wis (Perception) checks that use sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 3 Slams or 1 Harpoon and 2 Slams.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d6+5) bludgeoning damage + 9 (2d8) cold or poison (hunter’s choice) and target is grappled (escape DC 17). Hunter can grapple only one target at a time.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 12 (2d6+5) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) cold or poison (hunter’s choice) and harpoon sticks in target. While harpoon is stuck target takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at start of each of its turns hunter can’t make Harpoon attacks vs. other targets and target and hunter can’t move further than 60' away from each other. A creature including target can take its action to detach harpoon by succeeding on a DC 17 Str check. Alternatively cord connecting the leviathan hunter to the harpoon can be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 25; immunity to bludgeoning poison and psychic) dislodging harpoon into an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the target and preventing hunter from using Recall Harpoon.

actions.name: Crush
actions.desc: One creature grappled by hunter: 33 (8d6+5) bludgeoning damage (DC 17 Str half).

bonus_actions.name: Recall Harpoon
bonus_actions.desc: Pulls on the cord connected to its harpoon returning harpoon to its empty hand. If harpoon is stuck in a creature that creature must make DC 17 Str save or be pulled up to 20' toward the hunter.

reactions.name: Grappled Redirect
reactions.desc: If it is target of an attack it can see while grappling a creature it can hold the grappled creature in the way and the grappled creature becomes attack's target instead.

name: Musk Deer, Swarm
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny deer. Swarm can’t regain hp or gain temp hp.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm’s space. 18 (4d8) piercing damage or 9 (2d8) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

bonus_actions.name: Musk (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
bonus_actions.desc: As musk deer but save DC 12.

bonus_actions.name: Sprinter
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Dash action.

special_abilities.name: Well-Grounded
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on ability checks and saves made vs. effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Control Earth
bonus_actions.desc: Molds the ground near it causing one of: Stone Wall Causes wall of rock to rise from ground at a point it can see within 30' of it. Wall is up to 30' long 5 ft. high and 5 ft. thick. It can be any shape as long as its base is connected to the ground. If wall cuts through creature’s space when it appears creature is pushed to one side (catamount’s choice). If creature would be surrounded on all sides by the wall it can make a DC 14 Dex save. On success it can use its reaction to move up to its speed so it is not enclosed by the wall. Wall lasts 1 min or until catamount creates new wall.Fissure Catamount causes a rift to form in the ground at a point it can see within 30' of it. Rift can be up to 15 ft. wide up to 30' long and up to 10 ft. deep and can be any shape. Each creature standing on a spot where fissure opens must make DC 14 Dex save or fall in. Creature that successfully saves moves with fissure’s edge as it opens. Fissure that opens beneath a structure causes it to automatically collapse as if structure was in the area of an earthquake spell. It can have only one fissure open at a time. If it opens another previous fissure closes shunting all creatures inside it to surface.Tremors Catamount causes earth beneath its feet to shake and shift. Each creature within 30' of it: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone (DC 14 Str negates both).

special_abilities.name: Back Spikes
special_abilities.desc: Any Small or larger creature riding alke against its will: 14 (4d6) piercing damage (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: sight Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 30'+ straight toward a creature and then hits it with Claws on the same turn that target: DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone. If target is prone alke can make one Beak attack vs. it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Beak attack and two Claws attacks.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Piercing Roll (Recharge 4–6)
actions.desc: Tucks in its head and throws itself spikes first into nearby foes. Alke moves up to 25 ft. in a straight line and can move through space of any Med or smaller creature. The first time it enters a creature’s space during this move creature takes 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and 14 (4d6) piercing damage and is knocked prone (DC 15 Str half not knocked prone.)

reactions.name: Repelling Spikes
reactions.desc: Adds 3 to its AC vs. one melee or ranged weapon attack that would hit it. To do so the alke must see the attacker and not be prone.

special_abilities.name: Fiery Blood
special_abilities.desc: When it takes damage each creature within 5 ft. of it: DC 15 Dex save or take 3 (1d6) fire. The fire ignites flammable objects within 5 ft. of ibexian that aren’t being worn or carried.

special_abilities.name: Fiery Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight toward a target and then hits it with Ram attack on the same turn target takes extra 7 (2d6) fire. If target is a creature it must make DC 15 Str save or be pushed up to 10 ft. away and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on attacks vs. creature if 1+ unincapacitated attacker ally is within 5 ft. of target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Ram and one Hooves or two Spit Fires.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) fire.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 9 (2d4+4) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) fire.

actions.name: Spit Fire
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 16 (4d6+2) fire.

actions.name: Pyroclasm (1/Day)
actions.desc: Moves up to 30' in straight line to creature and can move through space of any Med or smaller creature stopping when it moves within 5 ft. of target. Each friendly ibexian within 50' of ibexian can use its reaction to also move up to its speed in straight line to target stopping when it moves within 5 ft. of target. This move doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks. Target and each creature within 20' of it: 14 (4d6) fire (DC 15 Dex half damage). For each ibexian in Pyroclasm after 1st fire increases by 3 (1d6) max (28) 8d6.

name: Gigantura
languages: understands Aquan and Deep Speech, but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Telescoping Eyes
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on sight and magical darkness doesn’t impede its darkvision. Also disadvantage on ability checks and saves vs. being blinded.

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: Can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Horrific Gaze. Then one Bite and two Tail Slaps.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 25 (3d12+6) piercing damage. If target is a Huge or smaller creature it must make DC 18 Dex save or be swallowed by gigantura. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained has total cover vs. attacks and effects outside gigantura and takes 21 (6d6) acid at start of each of gigantura’s turns. Gigantura can have up to 2 Huge 4 Large 6 Medium or 8 Small creatures swallowed at one time. If gigantura takes 30+ damage on a single turn from a creature inside it gigantura must make DC 20 Con save at end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures which fall prone in a space within 10 ft. of gigantura. If gigantura dies swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from corpse by using 20' of move exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail Slap
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 17 (2d10+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horrific Gaze
actions.desc: Its telescoping eyes swirl disconcertingly in direction of one creature it can see within 60' of it. If target can see gigantura target stunned until end of its next turn (DC 18 Con negates). A target that successfully saves is immune to this gigantura’s Horrific Gaze for the next 24 hrs.

name: Black Shuck
damage_immunities: necrotic, poison; bludgeoning, piercing or slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
languages: understands Abyssal and Common but can’t speak

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on attack rolls vs. any creature that doesn’t have all its hp.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Water Walker
special_abilities.desc: Can move across the surface of water as if it were harmless solid ground. This otherwise works like the water walk spell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Bites and can use Curse of the Grave or Fearsome Howl if available. If 2+ Bites hit a Med or smaller target black shuck sinks in its teeth shaking head violently. Target: DC 17 Str save or 7 (2d6) slashing damage and be thrown up to 15 ft. in random direction and knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage and 10 (3d6) necrotic.

actions.name: Curse of the Grave
actions.desc: Glares at one creature it can see within 30' of it. Target: DC 17 Wis save or be cursed: disadvantage on next two death saves it makes in the next 7 days. Curse lasts until cursed creature has made two death saves until 7 days have passed or until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Fearsome Howl (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Howls a haunting tune. Each creature within 60' and can hear it: frightened until the end of its next turn (DC 17 Wis negates). A frightened creature concentrating on a spell must make DC 17 Con save or it loses concentration.

bonus_actions.name: Mist Stalker
bonus_actions.desc: In dim light fog or mist it takes the Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Flesh-Eating Aura
special_abilities.desc: When creature that doesn’t have all of its hp starts its turn within 10 ft. of scarab creature takes 2 (1d4) necrotic. Also magical healing within 10 ft. of it is halved.

special_abilities.name: Silent Steps
special_abilities.desc: No sound emanates from it whether moving attacking or ripping into a corpse. Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks and each creature within 5 ft. of it is deafened.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Unstoppable
special_abilities.desc: Moving through difficult terrain doesn’t cost it extra movement and its speed can’t be reduced.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Bites. Can replace one attack with Gut Rip.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 14 (2d10+3) slashing damage + 5 (2d4) necrotic and knocked prone or pushed 5 ft. away the scarab’s choice (DC 14 Str negates prone/push).

actions.name: Gut Rip
actions.desc: The ruin scarab tears into one prone creature within 5 ft. of it. The target takes 11 (2d10) slashing damage and 5 (2d4) necrotic and is incapacitated for 1 min (DC 15 Con half damage and isn’t incapacitated). An incapacitated creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

reactions.name: Relentless Pursuit
reactions.desc: When a creature within 10 ft. of the scarab moves away from it scarab can move up to half its speed toward that creature.

name: Painted Phantasm
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: Immune: form-altering spells/effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: spell/magic effect saves.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: 2 Paint Slashes or 1 Capture Image and 1 Paint Slash.

actions.name: Capture Image
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 22 (4d10) force and target captured as image on flat surface of phantasm’s choice within 60' of it (DC 15 Cha negates). While an image target appears on surface as a painting drawing or similar and is incapacitated and restrained. Target can see and hear outside surface but can’t target those outside surface with spells or cast spells or use features that allow it to leave surface. If surface where target is captured takes damage target takes half. If surface is reduced to 0 hp target freed. Dispel magic (DC 15) cast on surface also frees captured creature. If phantasm takes 20+ damage on a single turn phantasm must make DC 15 Cha save at end of that turn or lose focus releasing all captured creatures.

actions.name: Paint Slash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d8+3) slashing damage + 16 (3d10) poison.

actions.name: Painting Sensor
actions.desc: While touching one artwork can see and hear through another it has previously touched as if it was in that artwork’s space if within 1 mile of it. “Artwork” can mean any painting drawing or design on a flat surface including pattern on a wall or in a book.

bonus_actions.name: Painting Portal
bonus_actions.desc: Uses 10 ft. of move to step magically into one artwork within reach and emerge from 2nd artwork within 100' of 1st appearing in unoccupied space within 5 ft. of 2nd. If both are Large or larger can bring up to 3 willing creatures.

name: Animated Instrument, Quartet
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
special_abilities.desc: The quartet is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic the quartet must succeed on a Con save vs. the caster’s spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 min.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: The quartet doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from group of musical instruments.

special_abilities.name: Four-Part Harmony
special_abilities.desc: An animated quartet is always composed of four instruments that sit or hover close together acting with singular intent. If an attack deals at least 25 damage to the quartet then one of the instruments falls unconscious causing the quartet to deal one die less of damage with its Trouble Clef and Orchestra Hit actions.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Trouble Clef or Orchestra Hit attacks.

actions.name: Trouble Clef
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (4d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Orchestra Hit
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, 60 ft., one target, 18 (4d6+4) thunder.

actions.name: Musical Arrangement
actions.desc: The quartet plays one of the following songs:Dreadful Dirge. The quartet plays a hair-raising tune that evokes terror. Each hostile creature within 30' of the quartet must make DC 14 Wis save or be frightened until the end of its next turn.Oppressive Overture. The quartet plays a heavy melody that reverberates through nearby creatures. Each hostile creature within 30' of the quartet must make DC 14 Str save or be knocked prone.Seditious Sonata. The quartet plays a song that incites disobedience and rebellion. Each hostile creature within 30' of the quartet must make DC 14 Cha save

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Regains 10 hp at start of its turn. If troll takes acid or fire this doesn’t function at start of troll’s next turn. Dies only if it starts turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Uncontrolled Growth
special_abilities.desc: When it regains hp from its Regeneration gains random teratoma. Teratoma and effects last until removed or replaced by another. Troll can have only 3 at a time. If it would gain a 4th oldest fades and is replaced. Teratomas (d6):1 New Senses: A bevy of new ears and noses give troll advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.2 Many Feet: The troll can’t be knocked prone.3 Adrenal Overdrive: Can’t be frightened or suffer exhaustion.4 Clinging Limbs: When this teratoma is removed with Fling Limb action it attaches to target. While attached to target target takes 3 (1d6) poison at start of each of its turns. A creature including target can use its action to detach teratoma.5 Echo Chambers: Has blindsight out to a range of 60'.6 New Pain Nerves: Disadvantage on any non-attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Bite and two Claw. Can replace one Claw with Fling Limb. When it does tumor troll doesn’t have disadvantage on this attack from being within 5 ft. of creature but can have disadvantage from other sources.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) poison.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fling Limb
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit 20/60' one target 9 (2d4+4) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) poison. Remove a teratoma from itself if it has one.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: smell Wis (Percept) checks.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If it takes 15 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hp it is reduced to 1 hp instead.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight toward a creature and then hits it with Bite on the same turn that target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If target is prone daeodon can make one Slam vs. it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and one Slam attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 14 (2d8+5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends the target is restrained and the daeodon can’t Bite another target.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fierce Call (Recharge: Short/Long Rest)
actions.desc: Lets out a loud fearsome call. Each hostile creature within 60' of the daeodon must make DC 13 Wis save or drop whatever it is holding and become frightened for 1 min. While frightened a creature must take the Dash action and move away from the daeodon by the safest available route on each of its turns unless there is nowhere to move. A frightened creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

special_abilities.name: Herd-Hidden (Herd Animal Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Dex (Stealth) and Cha (Deception) checks to blend into herd or convince those observing herd it is part of the herd.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on Wis (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: One of the Herd
special_abilities.desc: A domesticated herd animal such as a cow horse sheep or chicken that can see the herd skulker treats it as a member of the herd regardless of the form skulker takes. When such an animal sees a herd skulker attack or feed it becomes immune to herd skulker’s One of the Herd for the next 24 hrs acting as it normally would when confronting a predator. Creatures immune to the charmed condition are immune to this.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone.

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.desc: Transforms into a Large or smaller domesticated herd animal it can see such as a cow horse sheep or chicken or back into its true canine form. Its statistics other than its size are the same in each form. Reverts on death.

bonus_actions.name: Nimble Escape
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Disengage or Hide action.

special_abilities.name: Erratic Movement
special_abilities.desc: Opportunity attacks vs. the voidclaw zombie are made with disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: Advantage: saves vs. turn undead effects.

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hp it must make a Con save with DC of 5+the damage taken unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success the zombie drops to 1 hp instead.

special_abilities.name: Undead Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Void Claw or Void Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Void Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) slashing damage + 7 (2d6) necrotic. If target is creature other than Construct or Undead must make DC 15 Con save or take 3 (1d6) necrotic at start of each of its turns as wound burns with Void energy. Any creature can use action to purge energy from wound via DC 12 Int (Arcana) check. Energy also leaves the wound if target receives magical healing ending the effect.

actions.name: Void Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 16 (4d6+2) necrotic.

bonus_actions.name: Nimble Fighter
bonus_actions.desc: Takes Dash or Disengage action.

name: Ion Slime
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: Move through space 1ft.+ wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Ionic Form
special_abilities.desc: Whenever subjected to lightning it takes no damage and instead regains hp equal to lightning dealt. Its Supercharge then recharges. If it takes cold while supercharged it must roll a d6. On a 1 or 2 it loses the supercharged state.

special_abilities.name: Ooze Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require sleep.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 9 (2d8) lightning.

actions.name: Discharge (Supercharged Only)
actions.desc: Sends shock of lightning through its supercharged pseudopod at onecreature it can see within 5 ft. of it ending supercharged state. Target: 27 (6d8) lightning (DC 15 Con half). Three bolts of lightning then leap to as many as three targets each must be within 20' of first target. Target can be creature or object and each can be targeted by only one bolt. Each target: 13 (3d8) lightning (DC 15 Con half).

bonus_actions.name: Charged Motion (Supercharged Only)
bonus_actions.desc: Dash or Dodge action.

bonus_actions.name: Supercharge (Recharge 5–6)
bonus_actions.desc: Gathers ambient electricity to supercharge itself for 3 rounds. While supercharged slime gains +2 bonus to its AC and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. At end of the third round if the slime hasn’t used the Discharge action it suffers feedback taking 18 (4d8) force. Its supercharged state then ends.

special_abilities.name: Death Spores
special_abilities.desc: Each creature within 20' of it when it dies: 14 (4d6) poison and infected with grazer spores disease (DC 14 Con not poisoned or infected). Creatures immune to poisoned condition are immune to this. Until disease is cured creature poisoned and can’t regain hp except magically. Every 24 hrs that elapse target: DC 14 Con save or take 7 (2d6) poison and its hp max is reduced by same. Reduction lasts until target finishes a long rest after disease is cured. Target dies if this reduces its hp max to 0. Two days after creature dies rises as dust grazer of its size growing to Large over the course of a week.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 15 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage + 7 (2d6) acid. If target is a creature: grappled (escape DC 14) if grazer isn’t already grappling.

actions.name: Absorb
actions.desc: Makes one Tendril attack vs. a Med or smaller creature it is grappling. If attack hits target is  also absorbed into grazer’s body and grapple ends. While absorbed creature is blinded and restrained has total cover vs. attacks and effects outside grazer and takes 7 (2d6) acid at start of each of grazer’s turns. Grazer can have only one creature absorbed at a time. If grazer takes 10+ damage on a single turn from absorbed creature grazer must make DC 15 Con save at end of that turn or expel the creature which falls prone in a space within 5 ft. of grazer. If grazer is flying expelled creature takes normal fall damage. If grazer dies absorbed creature no longer restrained but has disadvantage on save vs. grazer Death Spores.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Gains 3 hp at the start of its turn. If the trollkin takes acid or fire this ability doesn’t function at the start of its next turn. It dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Thick Skin
special_abilities.desc: Its skin is thick and tough granting it a +1 bonus to Armor Class (already factored into its AC).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Mark Foe. Then two Hurl Flame attacks or three Staff attacks.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with 2 hands.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 8 (2d4+3) fire.

actions.name: Mark Foe
actions.desc: One creature shaman can see within 60' must make DC 13 Wis save or be wreathed in magical fire for 1 min. While wreathed it can’t take the Hide action or become invisible. The next time creature takes damage it takes an extra 7 (2d6) fire and the magical fire ends.

reactions.name: Fiery Escape (2/Day)
reactions.desc: When shaman takes damage each creature within 5 ft. of it: DC 13 Dex save or take 7 (2d6) fire. Shaman is then wreathed in flames and teleports up to 30' to unoccupied space it can see.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 20'+ straight to foe and hits with Slam attack on same turn target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature it must make DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone. If the elemental used Nimble Separation before making this Slam attack the target has disadvantage on the save.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn’t require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Slams or two Skipping Stones.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Skipping Stone
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit 20/60' one target 15 (2d8+6) bludgeoning damage and the stone bounces to another creature within 10 ft. of target. That creature must make DC 16 Dex save or take 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Nimble Separation
bonus_actions.desc: Can briefly separate its components parts and take the Dash action. Opportunity attacks vs. it have disadvantage until start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from ordinary torch.

special_abilities.name: Fiery Soul
special_abilities.desc: Can ignite or extinguish fire that crowns its head as a bonus action. While ignited it sheds bright light in a 20' radius and dim light for an extra 20 feet. When mimic is subjected to effect that would extinguish its flames vs. its will (ex: submerged in area of create or destroy water or gust of wind spells) mimic must make DC 11 Con save or fall unconscious until it takes damage or someone uses action to wake it. If effect is nonmagical mimic has advantage on the save.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Regains 2 hp at start of its turn. If mimic takes cold this doesn’t function at start of its next turn. Dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit 20/60' one target 7 (2d4+2) fire.

name: Forgotten Regent
damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lighting, thunder; nonmagic B/P/S attacks not made w/silvered weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages: any languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Frozen Reign
